132// TODO: investigate serializing other members of the Creature class hierarchy
133static void serialize( const weak_ptr_fast<monster> &obj, JsonOut &jsout )
134{
135 if( const auto monster_ptr = obj.lock() ) {
136 jsout.start_object();
137
138 jsout.member( "monster_at", monster_ptr->pos() );
139 // TODO: if monsters/Creatures ever get unique ids,
140 // create a differently named member, e.g.
141 // jsout.member("unique_id", monster_ptr->getID());
142 jsout.end_object();
143 } else {
144 // Monster went away. It's up the activity handler to detect this.
145 jsout.write_null();
146 }
147}
148
149static void deserialize( weak_ptr_fast<monster> &obj, JsonIn &jsin )
150{
151 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
152 data.allow_omitted_members();
153 tripoint temp_pos;
154
155 obj.reset();
156 if( data.read( "monster_at", temp_pos ) ) {
157 const auto monp = g->critter_tracker->find( temp_pos );
158
159 if( monp == nullptr ) {
160 debugmsg( "no monster found at %d,%d,%d", temp_pos.x, temp_pos.y, temp_pos.z );
161 return;
162 }
163
164 obj = monp;
165 }
166
167 // TODO: if monsters/Creatures ever get unique ids,
168 // look for a differently named member, e.g.
169 // data.read( "unique_id", unique_id );
170 // obj = g->id_registry->from_id( unique_id)
171 // }
172}
173
174void item_contents::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
175{
176 if( !items.empty() ) {
177 json.start_object();
178
179 json.member( "items", items );
180
181 json.end_object();
182 }
183}
184
185void item_contents::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
186{
187 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
188 data.allow_omitted_members();
189 data.read( "items", items );
190}

192////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
193///// player_activity.h
194
195void player_activity::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
196{
197 json.start_object();
198 json.member( "type", type );
199
200 if( !type.is_null() ) {
201 json.member( "actor", actor );
202 json.member( "moves_left", moves_left );
203 json.member( "index", index );
204 json.member( "position", position );
205 json.member( "coords", coords );
206 json.member( "coord_set", coord_set );
207 json.member( "name", name );
208 json.member( "targets", targets );
209 json.member( "placement", placement );
210 json.member( "values", values );
211 json.member( "str_values", str_values );
212 json.member( "auto_resume", auto_resume );
213 json.member( "monsters", monsters );
214 }
215 json.end_object();
216}
217
218void player_activity::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
219{
220 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
221 data.allow_omitted_members();
222 data.read( "type", type );
223
224 if( type.is_null() ) {
225 return;
226 }
227
228 const bool has_actor = activity_actors::deserialize_functions.find( type ) !=
229 activity_actors::deserialize_functions.end();
230
231 // Handle migration of pre-activity_actor activities
232 // ACT_MIGRATION_CANCEL will clear the backlog and reset npc state
233 // this may cause inconvenience but should avoid any lasting damage to npcs
234 if( has_actor && !data.has_member( "actor" ) ) {
235 type = activity_id( "ACT_MIGRATION_CANCEL" );
236 }
237
238 data.read( "actor", actor );
239 data.read( "moves_left", moves_left );
240 data.read( "index", index );
241 data.read( "position", position );
242 data.read( "coords", coords );
243 data.read( "coord_set", coord_set );
244 data.read( "name", name );
245 data.read( "targets", targets );
246 data.read( "placement", placement );
247 values = data.get_int_array( "values" );
248 str_values = data.get_string_array( "str_values" );
249 data.read( "auto_resume", auto_resume );
250 data.read( "monsters", monsters );
251
252}
253
254////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
255///// requirements.h
256void requirement_data::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
257{
258 json.start_object();
259
260 if( !is_null() ) {
261 json.member( "blacklisted", blacklisted );
262 const std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> req_comps = get_components();
263 const std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comps = get_tools();
264 const std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comps = get_qualities();
265
266 json.member( "req_comps_total", req_comps );
267
268 json.member( "tool_comps_total", tool_comps );
269
270 json.member( "quality_comps_total", quality_comps );
271 }
272 json.end_object();
273}
274
275void requirement_data::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
276{
277 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
278 data.allow_omitted_members();
279
280 data.read( "blacklisted", blacklisted );
281
282 data.read( "req_comps_total", components );
283 data.read( "tool_comps_total", tools );
284 data.read( "quality_comps_total", qualities );
285
286}

288////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
289///// skill.h
290void SkillLevel::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
291{
292 json.start_object();
293 json.member( "level", level() );
294 json.member( "exercise", exercise( true ) );
295 json.member( "istraining", isTraining() );
296 json.member( "lastpracticed", _lastPracticed );
297 json.member( "highestlevel", highestLevel() );
298 json.end_object();
299}
300
301void SkillLevel::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
302{
303 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
304 data.allow_omitted_members();
305 data.read( "level", _level );
306 data.read( "exercise", _exercise );
307 data.read( "istraining", _isTraining );
308 if( !data.read( "lastpracticed", _lastPracticed ) ) {
309 _lastPracticed = calendar::start_of_cataclysm + time_duration::from_hours(
310 get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TIME" ) );
311 }
312 data.read( "highestlevel", _highestLevel );
313 if( _highestLevel < _level ) {
314 _highestLevel = _level;
315 }
316}

370/**
371 * Gather variables for saving. These variables are common to both the avatar and NPCs.
372 */
373void Character::load( const JsonObject &data )
374{
375 data.allow_omitted_members();
376 Creature::load( data );
377
378 if( !data.read( "posx", position.x ) ) { // uh-oh.
379 debugmsg( "BAD PLAYER/NPC JSON: no 'posx'?" );
380 }
381 data.read( "posy", position.y );
382 if( !data.read( "posz", position.z ) && g != nullptr ) {
383 position.z = g->get_levz();
384 }
385 // stats
386 data.read( "str_cur", str_cur );
387 data.read( "str_max", str_max );
388 data.read( "dex_cur", dex_cur );
389 data.read( "dex_max", dex_max );
390 data.read( "int_cur", int_cur );
391 data.read( "int_max", int_max );
392 data.read( "per_cur", per_cur );
393 data.read( "per_max", per_max );
394
395 data.read( "str_bonus", str_bonus );
396 data.read( "dex_bonus", dex_bonus );
397 data.read( "per_bonus", per_bonus );
398 data.read( "int_bonus", int_bonus );
399 data.read( "omt_path", omt_path );
400
401 data.read( "base_age", init_age );
402 data.read( "base_height", init_height );
403
404 data.read( "custom_profession", custom_profession );
405
406 // needs
407 data.read( "thirst", thirst );
408 data.read( "fatigue", fatigue );
409 data.read( "sleep_deprivation", sleep_deprivation );
410 data.read( "stored_calories", stored_calories );
411 data.read( "radiation", radiation );
412 data.read( "oxygen", oxygen );
413 data.read( "pkill", pkill );
414
415 data.read( "type_of_scent", type_of_scent );
416
417 if( data.has_array( "ma_styles" ) ) {
418 std::vector<matype_id> temp_styles;
419 data.read( "ma_styles", temp_styles );
420 bool temp_keep_hands_free = false;
421 data.read( "keep_hands_free", temp_keep_hands_free );
422 matype_id temp_selected_style;
423 data.read( "style_selected", temp_selected_style );
424 if( !temp_selected_style.is_valid() ) {
425 temp_selected_style = matype_id( "style_none" );
426 }
427 martial_arts_data = pimpl<character_martial_arts>( character_martial_arts(
428 temp_styles, temp_selected_style, temp_keep_hands_free
429 ) );
430 } else {
431 data.read( "martial_arts_data", martial_arts_data );
432 }
433
434 JsonObject vits = data.get_object( "vitamin_levels" );
435 vits.allow_omitted_members();
436 for( const std::pair<const vitamin_id, vitamin> &v : vitamin::all() ) {
437 if( vits.has_member( v.first.str() ) ) {
438 int lvl = vits.get_int( v.first.str() );
439 vitamin_levels[v.first] = clamp( lvl, v.first->min(), v.first->max() );
440 }
441 }
442 data.read( "consumption_history", consumption_history );
443 data.read( "activity", activity );
444 data.read( "destination_activity", destination_activity );
445 data.read( "stashed_outbounds_activity", stashed_outbounds_activity );
446 data.read( "stashed_outbounds_backlog", stashed_outbounds_backlog );
447 data.read( "backlog", backlog );
448 if( !backlog.empty() && !backlog.front().str_values.empty() && ( ( activity &&
449 activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) || ( destination_activity &&
450 destination_activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) ) ) {
451 requirement_data fetch_reqs;
452 data.read( "fetch_data", fetch_reqs );
453 const requirement_id req_id( backlog.front().str_values.back() );
454 requirement_data::save_requirement( fetch_reqs, req_id );
455 }
456 // npc activity on vehicles.
457 data.read( "activity_vehicle_part_index", activity_vehicle_part_index );
458 // health
459 data.read( "healthy", healthy );
460 data.read( "healthy_mod", healthy_mod );
461 data.read( "healed_24h", healed_total );
462
463 // status
464 temp_cur.fill( 5000 );
465 data.read( "temp_cur", temp_cur );
466
467 temp_conv.fill( 5000 );
468 data.read( "temp_conv", temp_conv );
469
470 frostbite_timer.fill( 0 );
471 data.read( "frostbite_timer", frostbite_timer );
472
473 body_wetness.fill( 0 );
474 data.read( "body_wetness", body_wetness );
475
476 //energy
477 data.read( "stim", stim );
478 data.read( "stamina", stamina );
479
480 data.read( "damage_bandaged", damage_bandaged );
481 data.read( "damage_disinfected", damage_disinfected );
482 data.read( "magic", magic );
483 JsonArray parray;
484
485 data.read( "underwater", underwater );
486
487 data.read( "traits", my_traits );
488 for( auto it = my_traits.begin(); it != my_traits.end(); ) {
489 const auto &tid = *it;
490 if( tid.is_valid() ) {
491 ++it;
492 } else {
493 debugmsg( "character %s has invalid trait %s, it will be ignored", name, tid.c_str() );
494 my_traits.erase( it++ );
495 }
496 }
497
498 data.read( "mutations", my_mutations );
499 for( auto it = my_mutations.begin(); it != my_mutations.end(); ) {
500 const trait_id &mid = it->first;
501 if( mid.is_valid() ) {
502 on_mutation_gain( mid );
503 cached_mutations.push_back( &mid.obj() );
504 ++it;
505 } else {
506 debugmsg( "character %s has invalid mutation %s, it will be ignored", name, mid.c_str() );
507 it = my_mutations.erase( it );
508 }
509 }
510 recalculate_size();
511
512 data.read( "my_bionics", *my_bionics );
513
514 for( auto &w : worn ) {
515 w.on_takeoff( *this );
516 }
517 worn.clear();
518 data.read( "worn", worn );
519 for( auto &w : worn ) {
520 on_item_wear( w );
521 }
522
523 if( data.has_array( "hp_cur" ) ) {
524 set_anatomy( anatomy_id( "human_anatomy" ) );
525 set_body();
526 std::array<int, 6> hp_cur;
527 data.read( "hp_cur", hp_cur );
528 std::array<int, 6> hp_max;
529 data.read( "hp_max", hp_max );
530 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "head" ), hp_max[0] );
531 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "head" ), hp_cur[0] );
532
533 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "torso" ), hp_max[1] );
534 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "torso" ), hp_cur[1] );
535
536 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), hp_max[2] );
537 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), hp_cur[2] );
538
539 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), hp_max[3] );
540 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), hp_cur[3] );
541
542 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), hp_max[4] );
543 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), hp_cur[4] );
544
545 set_part_hp_max( bodypart_id( "leg_r" ), hp_max[5] );
546 set_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "leg_r" ), hp_cur[5] );
547 }
548
549
550 inv.clear();
551 if( data.has_member( "inv" ) ) {
552 JsonIn *invin = data.get_raw( "inv" );
553 inv.json_load_items( *invin );
554 }
555
556 weapon = item( "null", calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
557 data.read( "weapon", weapon );
558
559 data.read( "move_mode", move_mode );
560
561 if( has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
562 int temp_id;
563 if( data.read( "mounted_creature", temp_id ) ) {
564 mounted_creature_id = temp_id;
565 mounted_creature = g->critter_tracker->from_temporary_id( temp_id );
566 } else {
567 mounted_creature = nullptr;
568 }
569 }
570
571 morale->load( data );
572 // Have to go through effects again, in case an effect gained a morale bonus
573 for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
574 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, effect> &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
575 const effect &e = _effect_it.second;
576 on_effect_int_change( e.get_id(), e.get_intensity(), e.get_bp() );
577 }
578 }
579
580 _skills->clear();
581 for( const JsonMember member : data.get_object( "skills" ) ) {
582 member.read( ( *_skills )[skill_id( member.name() )] );
583 }
584
585 on_stat_change( "thirst", thirst );
586 on_stat_change( "stored_calories", stored_calories );
587 on_stat_change( "fatigue", fatigue );
588 on_stat_change( "sleep_deprivation", sleep_deprivation );
589 on_stat_change( "pkill", pkill );
590 on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", get_perceived_pain() );
591 recalc_sight_limits();
592 reset_encumbrance();
593
594 assign( data, "power_level", power_level, false, 0_kJ );
595 assign( data, "max_power_level", max_power_level, false, 0_kJ );
596
597 // Bionic power should not be negative!
598 if( power_level < 0_J ) {
599 power_level = 0_J;
600 }
601
602 JsonArray overmap_time_array = data.get_array( "overmap_time" );
603 overmap_time.clear();
604 while( overmap_time_array.has_more() ) {
605 point_abs_omt pt;
606 overmap_time_array.read_next( pt );
607 time_duration tdr = 0_turns;
608 overmap_time_array.read_next( tdr );
609 overmap_time[pt] = tdr;
610 }
611 data.read( "stomach", stomach );
612 data.read( "automoveroute", auto_move_route );
613
614 known_traps.clear();
615 for( JsonObject pmap : data.get_array( "known_traps" ) ) {
616 pmap.allow_omitted_members();
617 const tripoint p( pmap.get_int( "x" ), pmap.get_int( "y" ), pmap.get_int( "z" ) );
618 const std::string t = pmap.get_string( "trap" );
619 known_traps.insert( trap_map::value_type( p, t ) );
620 }
621}
622
623/**
624 * Load variables from json into object. These variables are common to both the avatar and NPCs.
625 */
626void Character::store( JsonOut &json ) const
627{
628 Creature::store( json );
629
630 // assumes already in Character object
631 // positional data
632 json.member( "posx", position.x );
633 json.member( "posy", position.y );
634 json.member( "posz", position.z );
635
636 // stat
637 json.member( "str_cur", str_cur );
638 json.member( "str_max", str_max );
639 json.member( "dex_cur", dex_cur );
640 json.member( "dex_max", dex_max );
641 json.member( "int_cur", int_cur );
642 json.member( "int_max", int_max );
643 json.member( "per_cur", per_cur );
644 json.member( "per_max", per_max );
645
646 json.member( "str_bonus", str_bonus );
647 json.member( "dex_bonus", dex_bonus );
648 json.member( "per_bonus", per_bonus );
649 json.member( "int_bonus", int_bonus );
650
651 json.member( "base_age", init_age );
652 json.member( "base_height", init_height );
653
654 json.member( "custom_profession", custom_profession );
655
656 // health
657 json.member( "healthy", healthy );
658 json.member( "healthy_mod", healthy_mod );
659 json.member( "healed_24h", healed_total );
660
661 // status
662 json.member( "temp_cur", temp_cur );
663 json.member( "temp_conv", temp_conv );
664 json.member( "frostbite_timer", frostbite_timer );
665 json.member( "body_wetness", body_wetness );
666
667 // needs
668 json.member( "thirst", thirst );
669 json.member( "fatigue", fatigue );
670 json.member( "sleep_deprivation", sleep_deprivation );
671 json.member( "stored_calories", stored_calories );
672 json.member( "radiation", radiation );
673 json.member( "stamina", stamina );
674 json.member( "vitamin_levels", vitamin_levels );
675 json.member( "pkill", pkill );
676 json.member( "omt_path", omt_path );
677 json.member( "consumption_history", consumption_history );
678
679 // crafting etc
680 json.member( "destination_activity", destination_activity );
681 json.member( "activity", activity );
682 json.member( "stashed_outbounds_activity", stashed_outbounds_activity );
683 json.member( "stashed_outbounds_backlog", stashed_outbounds_backlog );
684 json.member( "backlog", backlog );
685 json.member( "activity_vehicle_part_index", activity_vehicle_part_index ); // NPC activity
686
687 // handling for storing activity requirements
688 if( !backlog.empty() && !backlog.front().str_values.empty() && ( ( activity &&
689 activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) || ( destination_activity &&
690 destination_activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED" ) ) ) ) {
691 requirement_data things_to_fetch = requirement_id( backlog.front().str_values.back() ).obj();
692 json.member( "fetch_data", things_to_fetch );
693 }
694
695 json.member( "stim", stim );
696 json.member( "type_of_scent", type_of_scent );
697
698 // breathing
699 json.member( "underwater", underwater );
700 json.member( "oxygen", oxygen );
701
702 // traits: permanent 'mutations' more or less
703 json.member( "traits", my_traits );
704 json.member( "mutations", my_mutations );
705 json.member( "magic", magic );
706 json.member( "martial_arts_data", martial_arts_data );
707 // "Fracking Toasters" - Saul Tigh, toaster
708 json.member( "my_bionics", *my_bionics );
709
710 json.member_as_string( "move_mode", move_mode );
711
712 // storing the mount
713 if( is_mounted() ) {
714 json.member( "mounted_creature", g->critter_tracker->temporary_id( *mounted_creature ) );
715 }
716
717 morale->store( json );
718
719 // skills
720 json.member( "skills" );
721 json.start_object();
722 for( const auto &pair : *_skills ) {
723 json.member( pair.first.str(), pair.second );
724 }
725 json.end_object();
726
727 // npc; unimplemented
728 if( power_level < 1_kJ ) {
729 json.member( "power_level", std::to_string( units::to_joule( power_level ) ) + " J" );
730 } else {
731 json.member( "power_level", units::to_kilojoule( power_level ) );
732 }
733 json.member( "max_power_level", units::to_kilojoule( max_power_level ) );
734
735 if( !overmap_time.empty() ) {
736 json.member( "overmap_time" );
737 json.start_array();
738 for( const std::pair<const point_abs_omt, time_duration> &pr : overmap_time ) {
739 json.write( pr.first );
740 json.write( pr.second );
741 }
742 json.end_array();
743 }
744 json.member( "stomach", stomach );
745 json.member( "automoveroute", auto_move_route );
746 json.member( "known_traps" );
747 json.start_array();
748 for( const auto &elem : known_traps ) {
749 json.start_object();
750 json.member( "x", elem.first.x );
751 json.member( "y", elem.first.y );
752 json.member( "z", elem.first.z );
753 json.member( "trap", elem.second );
754 json.end_object();
755 }
756 json.end_array();
757}

762/**
763 * Gather variables for saving. These variables are common to both the avatar and npcs.
764 */
765void player::store( JsonOut &json ) const
766{
767 Character::store( json );
768
769 // energy
770 json.member( "last_sleep_check", last_sleep_check );
771 // misc levels
772 json.member( "tank_plut", tank_plut );
773 json.member( "reactor_plut", reactor_plut );
774 json.member( "slow_rad", slow_rad );
775 json.member( "scent", static_cast<int>( scent ) );
776
777 // gender
778 json.member( "male", male );
779
780 json.member( "cash", cash );
781 json.member( "recoil", recoil );
782 json.member( "in_vehicle", in_vehicle );
783 json.member( "id", getID() );
784
785 // potential incompatibility with future expansion
786 json.member( "damage_bandaged", damage_bandaged );
787 json.member( "damage_disinfected", damage_disinfected );
788 // "Looks like I picked the wrong week to quit smoking." - Steve McCroskey
789 json.member( "addictions", addictions );
790 json.member( "followers", follower_ids );
791
792 json.member( "worn", worn ); // also saves contents
793 json.member( "inv" );
794 inv.json_save_items( json );
795
796 if( !weapon.is_null() ) {
797 json.member( "weapon", weapon ); // also saves contents
798 }
799
800 if( const auto lt_ptr = last_target.lock() ) {
801 if( const npc *const guy = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( lt_ptr.get() ) ) {
802 json.member( "last_target", guy->getID() );
803 json.member( "last_target_type", +1 );
804 } else if( const monster *const mon = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( lt_ptr.get() ) ) {
805 // monsters don't have IDs, so get its index in the Creature_tracker instead
806 json.member( "last_target", g->critter_tracker->temporary_id( *mon ) );
807 json.member( "last_target_type", -1 );
808 }
809 } else {
810 json.member( "last_target_pos", last_target_pos );
811 }
812
813 json.member( "destination_point", destination_point );
814
815 // faction warnings
816 json.member( "faction_warnings" );
817 json.start_array();
818 for( const auto &elem : warning_record ) {
819 json.start_object();
820 json.member( "fac_warning_id", elem.first );
821 json.member( "fac_warning_num", elem.second.first );
822 json.member( "fac_warning_time", elem.second.second );
823 json.end_object();
824 }
825 json.end_array();
826
827 json.member( "ammo_location", ammo_location );
828
829 // TODO: move to Character
830 json.member( "camps" );
831 json.start_array();
832 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &bcpt : camps ) {
833 json.start_object();
834 json.member( "pos", bcpt );
835 json.end_object();
836 }
837 json.end_array();
838}
839
840/**
841 * Load variables from json into object. These variables are common to both the avatar and NPCs.
842 */
843void player::load( const JsonObject &data )
844{
845 Character::load( data );
846
847 JsonArray parray;
848 character_id tmpid;
849
850 data.read( "tank_plut", tank_plut );
851 data.read( "reactor_plut", reactor_plut );
852 data.read( "slow_rad", slow_rad );
853 data.read( "scent", scent );
854 data.read( "male", male );
855 data.read( "cash", cash );
856 data.read( "recoil", recoil );
857 data.read( "in_vehicle", in_vehicle );
858 data.read( "last_sleep_check", last_sleep_check );
859 if( data.read( "id", tmpid ) && tmpid.is_valid() ) {
860 // Templates have invalid ids, so we only assign here when valid.
861 // When the game starts, a new valid id will be assigned if not already
862 // present.
863 setID( tmpid );
864 }
865
866 data.read( "addictions", addictions );
867 data.read( "followers", follower_ids );
868
869 // Add the earplugs.
870 if( has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_ears" ) ) && !has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_earplugs" ) ) ) {
871 add_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_earplugs" ) );
872 }
873
874 // Add the blindfold.
875 if( has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_sunglasses" ) ) && !has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_blindfold" ) ) ) {
876 add_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_blindfold" ) );
877 }
878
879 // Fixes bugged characters for CBM's preventing mutations.
880 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
881 for( const trait_id &mid : bid->canceled_mutations ) {
882 if( has_trait( mid ) ) {
883 remove_mutation( mid );
884 }
885 }
886 }
887
888 if( data.has_array( "faction_warnings" ) ) {
889 for( JsonObject warning_data : data.get_array( "faction_warnings" ) ) {
890 warning_data.allow_omitted_members();
891 std::string fac_id = warning_data.get_string( "fac_warning_id" );
892 int warning_num = warning_data.get_int( "fac_warning_num" );
893 time_point warning_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
894 warning_data.read( "fac_warning_time", warning_time );
895 warning_record[faction_id( fac_id )] = std::make_pair( warning_num, warning_time );
896 }
897 }
898
899 int tmptar;
900 int tmptartyp = 0;
901
902 data.read( "last_target", tmptar );
903 data.read( "last_target_type", tmptartyp );
904 data.read( "last_target_pos", last_target_pos );
905 data.read( "ammo_location", ammo_location );
906 if( tmptartyp == +1 ) {
907 // Use overmap_buffer because game::active_npc is not filled yet.
908 last_target = overmap_buffer.find_npc( character_id( tmptar ) );
909 } else if( tmptartyp == -1 ) {
910 // Need to do this *after* the monsters have been loaded!
911 last_target = g->critter_tracker->from_temporary_id( tmptar );
912 }
913 data.read( "destination_point", destination_point );
914 // TODO: move to Character
915 camps.clear();
916 for( JsonObject bcdata : data.get_array( "camps" ) ) {
917 bcdata.allow_omitted_members();
918 tripoint_abs_omt bcpt;
919 bcdata.read( "pos", bcpt );
920 camps.insert( bcpt );
921 }
922}

935
936void avatar::store( JsonOut &json ) const
937{
938 player::store( json );
939
940 // player-specific specifics
941 if( prof != nullptr ) {
942 json.member( "profession", prof->ident() );
943 }
944 if( g->scen != nullptr ) {
945 json.member( "scenario", g->scen->ident() );
946 }
947 // someday, npcs may drive
948 json.member( "controlling_vehicle", controlling_vehicle );
949
950 // shopping carts, furniture etc
951 json.member( "grab_point", grab_point );
952 json.member( "grab_type", obj_type_name[static_cast<int>( grab_type ) ] );
953
954 // misc player specific stuff
955 json.member( "focus_pool", focus_pool );
956
957 // stats through kills
958 json.member( "str_upgrade", std::abs( str_upgrade ) );
959 json.member( "dex_upgrade", std::abs( dex_upgrade ) );
960 json.member( "int_upgrade", std::abs( int_upgrade ) );
961 json.member( "per_upgrade", std::abs( per_upgrade ) );
962
963 // npc: unimplemented, potentially useful
964 json.member( "learned_recipes", *learned_recipes );
965
966 // Player only, books they have read at least once.
967 json.member( "items_identified", items_identified );
968
969 json.member( "translocators", translocators );
970
971 // mission stuff
972 json.member( "active_mission", active_mission == nullptr ? -1 : active_mission->get_id() );
973
974 json.member( "active_missions", mission::to_uid_vector( active_missions ) );
975 json.member( "completed_missions", mission::to_uid_vector( completed_missions ) );
976 json.member( "failed_missions", mission::to_uid_vector( failed_missions ) );
977
978 json.member( "show_map_memory", show_map_memory );
979
980 json.member( "assigned_invlet" );
981 json.start_array();
982 for( auto iter : inv.assigned_invlet ) {
983 json.start_array();
984 json.write( iter.first );
985 json.write( iter.second );
986 json.end_array();
987 }
988 json.end_array();
989
990 json.member( "invcache" );
991 inv.json_save_invcache( json );
992
993 json.member( "preferred_aiming_mode", preferred_aiming_mode );
994}

999 data.allow_omitted_members();
1000 load( data );
1001}
1002
1003void avatar::load( const JsonObject &data )
1004{
1005 player::load( data );
1006
1007 std::string prof_ident = "(null)";
1008 if( data.read( "profession", prof_ident ) && string_id<profession>( prof_ident ).is_valid() ) {
1009 prof = &string_id<profession>( prof_ident ).obj();
1010 } else {
1011 //We are likely an older profession which has since been removed so just set to default. This is only cosmetic after game start.
1012 prof = profession::generic();
1013 }
1014
1015 data.read( "controlling_vehicle", controlling_vehicle );
1016
1017 data.read( "grab_point", grab_point );
1018 std::string grab_typestr = "OBJECT_NONE";
1019 if( grab_point.x != 0 || grab_point.y != 0 ) {
1020 grab_typestr = "OBJECT_VEHICLE";
1021 data.read( "grab_type", grab_typestr );
1022 }
1023 const auto iter = std::find( obj_type_name.begin(), obj_type_name.end(), grab_typestr );
1024 grab( iter == obj_type_name.end() ?
1025 OBJECT_NONE : static_cast<object_type>( std::distance( obj_type_name.begin(), iter ) ),
1026 grab_point );
1027
1028 data.read( "focus_pool", focus_pool );
1029
1030 // stats through kills
1031 data.read( "str_upgrade", str_upgrade );
1032 data.read( "dex_upgrade", dex_upgrade );
1033 data.read( "int_upgrade", int_upgrade );
1034 data.read( "per_upgrade", per_upgrade );
1035
1036 // this is so we don't need to call get_option in a draw function
1037 if( !get_option<bool>( "STATS_THROUGH_KILLS" ) ) {
1038 str_upgrade = -str_upgrade;
1039 dex_upgrade = -dex_upgrade;
1040 int_upgrade = -int_upgrade;
1041 per_upgrade = -per_upgrade;
1042 }
1043
1044 data.read( "magic", magic );
1045
1046 set_highest_cat_level();
1047 drench_mut_calc();
1048 std::string scen_ident = "(null)";
1049 if( data.read( "scenario", scen_ident ) && string_id<scenario>( scen_ident ).is_valid() ) {
1050 g->scen = &string_id<scenario>( scen_ident ).obj();
1051
1052 if( !g->scen->allowed_start( start_location ) ) {
1053 start_location = g->scen->random_start_location();
1054 }
1055 } else {
1056 const scenario *generic_scenario = scenario::generic();
1057 // Only display error message if from a game file after scenarios existed.
1058 if( savegame_loading_version > 20 ) {
1059 debugmsg( "Tried to use non-existent scenario '%s'. Setting to generic '%s'.",
1060 scen_ident.c_str(), generic_scenario->ident().c_str() );
1061 }
1062 g->scen = generic_scenario;
1063 }
1064
1065 data.read( "learned_recipes", *learned_recipes );
1066 valid_autolearn_skills->clear(); // Invalidates the cache
1067
1068 items_identified.clear();
1069 data.read( "items_identified", items_identified );
1070
1071 data.read( "translocators", translocators );
1072
1073 std::vector<int> tmpmissions;
1074 if( data.read( "active_missions", tmpmissions ) ) {
1075 active_missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1076 }
1077 if( data.read( "failed_missions", tmpmissions ) ) {
1078 failed_missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1079 }
1080 if( data.read( "completed_missions", tmpmissions ) ) {
1081 completed_missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1082 }
1083
1084 int tmpactive_mission = 0;
1085 if( data.read( "active_mission", tmpactive_mission ) ) {
1086 if( savegame_loading_version <= 23 ) {
1087 // In 0.C, active_mission was an index of the active_missions array (-1 indicated no active mission).
1088 // And it would as often as not be out of bounds (e.g. when a questgiver died).
1089 // Later, it became a mission * and stored as the mission's uid, and this change broke backward compatibility.
1090 // Unfortunately, nothing can be done about savegames between the bump to version 24 and 83808a941.
1091 if( tmpactive_mission >= 0 && tmpactive_mission < static_cast<int>( active_missions.size() ) ) {
1092 active_mission = active_missions[tmpactive_mission];
1093 } else if( !active_missions.empty() ) {
1094 active_mission = active_missions.back();
1095 }
1096 } else if( tmpactive_mission != -1 ) {
1097 active_mission = mission::find( tmpactive_mission );
1098 }
1099 }
1100
1101 // Normally there is only one player character loaded, so if a mission that is assigned to
1102 // another character (not the current one) fails, the other character(s) are not informed.
1103 // We must inform them when they get loaded the next time.
1104 // Only active missions need checking, failed/complete will not change anymore.
1105 const auto last = std::remove_if( active_missions.begin(),
1106 active_missions.end(), []( mission const * m ) {
1107 return m->has_failed();
1108 } );
1109 std::copy( last, active_missions.end(), std::back_inserter( failed_missions ) );
1110 active_missions.erase( last, active_missions.end() );
1111 if( active_mission && active_mission->has_failed() ) {
1112 if( active_missions.empty() ) {
1113 active_mission = nullptr;
1114 } else {
1115 active_mission = active_missions.front();
1116 }
1117 }
1118
1119 if( savegame_loading_version <= 23 && is_player() ) {
1120 // In 0.C there was no player_id member of mission, so it'll be the default -1.
1121 // When the member was introduced, no steps were taken to ensure compatibility with 0.C, so
1122 // missions will be buggy for saves between experimental commits bd2088c033 and dd83800.
1123 // see npc_chatbin::check_missions and npc::talk_to_u
1124 for( mission *miss : active_missions ) {
1125 miss->set_player_id_legacy_0c( getID() );
1126 }
1127 }
1128
1129 data.read( "show_map_memory", show_map_memory );
1130
1131 for( JsonArray pair : data.get_array( "assigned_invlet" ) ) {
1132 inv.assigned_invlet[static_cast<char>( pair.get_int( 0 ) )] =
1133 itype_id( pair.get_string( 1 ) );
1134 }
1135
1136 if( data.has_member( "invcache" ) ) {
1137 JsonIn *jip = data.get_raw( "invcache" );
1138 inv.json_load_invcache( *jip );
1139 }
1140
1141 data.read( "preferred_aiming_mode", preferred_aiming_mode );
1142}

1144////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1145///// npc.h
1146
1147void npc_follower_rules::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1148{
1149 json.start_object();
1150 json.member( "engagement", static_cast<int>( engagement ) );
1151 json.member( "aim", static_cast<int>( aim ) );
1152 json.member( "cbm_reserve", static_cast<int>( cbm_reserve ) );
1153 json.member( "cbm_recharge", static_cast<int>( cbm_recharge ) );
1154
1155 // serialize the flags so they can be changed between save games
1156 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1157 json.member( "rule_" + rule.first, has_flag( rule.second.rule, false ) );
1158 }
1159 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1160 json.member( "override_enable_" + rule.first, has_override_enable( rule.second.rule ) );
1161 }
1162 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1163 json.member( "override_" + rule.first, has_override( rule.second.rule ) );
1164 }
1165
1166 json.member( "pickup_whitelist", *pickup_whitelist );
1167
1168 json.end_object();
1169}
1170
1171void npc_follower_rules::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1172{
1173 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1174 data.allow_omitted_members();
1175 int tmpeng = 0;
1176 data.read( "engagement", tmpeng );
1177 engagement = static_cast<combat_engagement>( tmpeng );
1178 int tmpaim = 0;
1179 data.read( "aim", tmpaim );
1180 aim = static_cast<aim_rule>( tmpaim );
1181 int tmpreserve = 50;
1182 data.read( "cbm_reserve", tmpreserve );
1183 cbm_reserve = static_cast<cbm_reserve_rule>( tmpreserve );
1184 int tmprecharge = 50;
1185 data.read( "cbm_recharge", tmprecharge );
1186 cbm_recharge = static_cast<cbm_recharge_rule>( tmprecharge );
1187
1188 // deserialize the flags so they can be changed between save games
1189 for( const auto &rule : ally_rule_strs ) {
1190 bool tmpflag = false;
1191 // legacy to handle rules that were saved before overrides
1192 data.read( rule.first, tmpflag );
1193 if( tmpflag ) {
1194 set_flag( rule.second.rule );
1195 } else {
1196 clear_flag( rule.second.rule );
1197 }
1198 data.read( "rule_" + rule.first, tmpflag );
1199 if( tmpflag ) {
1200 set_flag( rule.second.rule );
1201 } else {
1202 clear_flag( rule.second.rule );
1203 }
1204 data.read( "override_enable_" + rule.first, tmpflag );
1205 if( tmpflag ) {
1206 enable_override( rule.second.rule );
1207 } else {
1208 disable_override( rule.second.rule );
1209 }
1210 data.read( "override_" + rule.first, tmpflag );
1211 if( tmpflag ) {
1212 set_override( rule.second.rule );
1213 } else {
1214 clear_override( rule.second.rule );
1215 }
1216
1217 // This and the following two entries are for legacy save game handling.
1218 // "avoid_combat" was renamed "follow_close" to better reflect behavior.
1219 if( data.has_member( "rule_avoid_combat" ) ) {
1220 data.read( "rule_avoid_combat", tmpflag );
1221 if( tmpflag ) {
1222 set_flag( ally_rule::follow_close );
1223 } else {
1224 clear_flag( ally_rule::follow_close );
1225 }
1226 }
1227 if( data.has_member( "override_enable_avoid_combat" ) ) {
1228 data.read( "override_enable_avoid_combat", tmpflag );
1229 if( tmpflag ) {
1230 enable_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1231 } else {
1232 disable_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1233 }
1234 }
1235 if( data.has_member( "override_avoid_combat" ) ) {
1236 data.read( "override_avoid_combat", tmpflag );
1237 if( tmpflag ) {
1238 set_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1239 } else {
1240 clear_override( ally_rule::follow_close );
1241 }
1242 }
1243 }
1244
1245 data.read( "pickup_whitelist", *pickup_whitelist );
1246}
1247
1248void npc_chatbin::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1249{
1250 json.start_object();
1251 json.member( "first_topic", first_topic );
1252 if( mission_selected != nullptr ) {
1253 json.member( "mission_selected", mission_selected->get_id() );
1254 }
1255 json.member( "skill", skill );
1256 json.member( "style", style );
1257 json.member( "missions", mission::to_uid_vector( missions ) );
1258 json.member( "missions_assigned", mission::to_uid_vector( missions_assigned ) );
1259 json.end_object();
1260}
1261
1262void npc_chatbin::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1263{
1264 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1265 data.allow_omitted_members();
1266
1267 if( data.has_int( "first_topic" ) ) {
1268 int tmptopic = 0;
1269 data.read( "first_topic", tmptopic );
1270 first_topic = convert_talk_topic( static_cast<talk_topic_enum>( tmptopic ) );
1271 } else {
1272 data.read( "first_topic", first_topic );
1273 }
1274
1275 data.read( "skill", skill );
1276 data.read( "style", style );
1277
1278 std::vector<int> tmpmissions;
1279 data.read( "missions", tmpmissions );
1280 missions = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions );
1281 std::vector<int> tmpmissions_assigned;
1282 data.read( "missions_assigned", tmpmissions_assigned );
1283 missions_assigned = mission::to_ptr_vector( tmpmissions_assigned );
1284
1285 int tmpmission_selected = 0;
1286 mission_selected = nullptr;
1287 if( data.read( "mission_selected", tmpmission_selected ) && tmpmission_selected != -1 ) {
1288 if( savegame_loading_version <= 23 ) {
1289 // In 0.C, it was an index into the missions_assigned vector
1290 if( tmpmission_selected >= 0 &&
1291 tmpmission_selected < static_cast<int>( missions_assigned.size() ) ) {
1292 mission_selected = missions_assigned[tmpmission_selected];
1293 }
1294 } else {
1295 mission_selected = mission::find( tmpmission_selected );
1296 }
1297 }
1298}
1299
1300void npc_personality::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1301{
1302 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1303 data.allow_omitted_members();
1304 int tmpagg = 0;
1305 int tmpbrav = 0;
1306 int tmpcol = 0;
1307 int tmpalt = 0;
1308 if( data.read( "aggression", tmpagg ) &&
1309 data.read( "bravery", tmpbrav ) &&
1310 data.read( "collector", tmpcol ) &&
1311 data.read( "altruism", tmpalt ) ) {
1312 aggression = static_cast<signed char>( tmpagg );
1313 bravery = static_cast<signed char>( tmpbrav );
1314 collector = static_cast<signed char>( tmpcol );
1315 altruism = static_cast<signed char>( tmpalt );
1316 } else {
1317 debugmsg( "npc_personality: bad data" );
1318 }
1319}

1326 json.member( "collector", static_cast<int>( collector ) );
1327 json.member( "altruism", static_cast<int>( altruism ) );
1328 json.end_object();
1329}

1394/*
1395 * load npc
1396 */
1397void npc::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1398{
1399 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1400 load( data );
1401}
1402
1403void npc::load( const JsonObject &data )
1404{
1405 player::load( data );
1406
1407 int misstmp = 0;
1408 int classtmp = 0;
1409 int atttmp = 0;
1410 std::string facID;
1411 std::string comp_miss_id;
1412 std::string comp_miss_role;
1413 tripoint_abs_omt comp_miss_pt;
1414 std::string classid;
1415 std::string companion_mission_role;
1416 time_point companion_mission_t = calendar::start_of_cataclysm;
1417 time_point companion_mission_t_r = calendar::start_of_cataclysm;
1418 std::string act_id;
1419
1420 data.read( "name", name );
1421 data.read( "marked_for_death", marked_for_death );
1422 data.read( "dead", dead );
1423 data.read( "patience", patience );
1424 if( data.has_number( "myclass" ) ) {
1425 data.read( "myclass", classtmp );
1426 myclass = npc_class::from_legacy_int( classtmp );
1427 } else if( data.has_string( "myclass" ) ) {
1428 data.read( "myclass", classid );
1429 myclass = npc_class_id( classid );
1430 }
1431 data.read( "known_to_u", known_to_u );
1432 data.read( "personality", personality );
1433 if( !data.read( "submap_coords", submap_coords ) ) {
1434 // Old submap coordinates are for the point (0, 0, 0) on local map
1435 // New ones are for submap that contains pos
1436 point old_coords;
1437 data.read( "mapx", old_coords.x );
1438 data.read( "mapy", old_coords.y );
1439 int o = 0;
1440 if( data.read( "omx", o ) ) {
1441 old_coords.x += o * OMAPX * 2;
1442 }
1443 if( data.read( "omy", o ) ) {
1444 old_coords.y += o * OMAPY * 2;
1445 }
1446 submap_coords = old_coords + point( posx() / SEEX, posy() / SEEY );
1447 }
1448
1449 if( !data.read( "mapz", position.z ) ) {
1450 data.read( "omz", position.z ); // omz/mapz got moved to position.z
1451 }
1452
1453 if( data.has_member( "plx" ) ) {
1454 last_player_seen_pos.emplace();
1455 data.read( "plx", last_player_seen_pos->x );
1456 data.read( "ply", last_player_seen_pos->y );
1457 if( !data.read( "plz", last_player_seen_pos->z ) ) {
1458 last_player_seen_pos->z = posz();
1459 }
1460 // old code used tripoint_min to indicate "not a valid point"
1461 if( *last_player_seen_pos == tripoint_min ) {
1462 last_player_seen_pos.reset();
1463 }
1464 } else {
1465 data.read( "last_player_seen_pos", last_player_seen_pos );
1466 }
1467
1468 data.read( "goalx", goal.x() );
1469 data.read( "goaly", goal.y() );
1470 data.read( "goalz", goal.z() );
1471
1472 data.read( "guardx", guard_pos.x );
1473 data.read( "guardy", guard_pos.y );
1474 data.read( "guardz", guard_pos.z );
1475 if( data.read( "current_activity_id", act_id ) ) {
1476 current_activity_id = activity_id( act_id );
1477 } else if( activity ) {
1478 current_activity_id = activity.id();
1479 }
1480
1481 if( data.has_member( "pulp_locationx" ) ) {
1482 pulp_location.emplace();
1483 data.read( "pulp_locationx", pulp_location->x );
1484 data.read( "pulp_locationy", pulp_location->y );
1485 data.read( "pulp_locationz", pulp_location->z );
1486 // old code used tripoint_min to indicate "not a valid point"
1487 if( *pulp_location == tripoint_min ) {
1488 pulp_location.reset();
1489 }
1490 } else {
1491 data.read( "pulp_location", pulp_location );
1492 }
1493 data.read( "assigned_camp", assigned_camp );
1494 data.read( "chair_pos", chair_pos );
1495 data.read( "wander_pos", wander_pos );
1496 data.read( "job", job );
1497 if( data.read( "mission", misstmp ) ) {
1498 mission = static_cast<npc_mission>( misstmp );
1499 static const std::set<npc_mission> legacy_missions = {{
1500 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_1, NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_2,
1501 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_3
1502 }
1503 };
1504 if( legacy_missions.count( mission ) > 0 ) {
1505 mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
1506 }
1507 }
1508 if( data.read( "previous_mission", misstmp ) ) {
1509 previous_mission = static_cast<npc_mission>( misstmp );
1510 static const std::set<npc_mission> legacy_missions = {{
1511 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_1, NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_2,
1512 NPC_MISSION_LEGACY_3
1513 }
1514 };
1515 if( legacy_missions.count( mission ) > 0 ) {
1516 previous_mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
1517 }
1518 }
1519
1520 if( data.read( "my_fac", facID ) ) {
1521 fac_id = faction_id( facID );
1522 }
1523 int temp_fac_api_ver = 0;
1524 if( data.read( "faction_api_ver", temp_fac_api_ver ) ) {
1525 faction_api_version = temp_fac_api_ver;
1526 } else {
1527 faction_api_version = 0;
1528 }
1529
1530 if( data.read( "attitude", atttmp ) ) {
1531 attitude = static_cast<npc_attitude>( atttmp );
1532 static const std::set<npc_attitude> legacy_attitudes = {{
1533 NPCATT_LEGACY_1, NPCATT_LEGACY_2, NPCATT_LEGACY_3,
1534 NPCATT_LEGACY_4, NPCATT_LEGACY_5, NPCATT_LEGACY_6
1535 }
1536 };
1537 if( legacy_attitudes.count( attitude ) > 0 ) {
1538 attitude = NPCATT_NULL;
1539 }
1540 }
1541 if( data.read( "previous_attitude", atttmp ) ) {
1542 previous_attitude = static_cast<npc_attitude>( atttmp );
1543 static const std::set<npc_attitude> legacy_attitudes = {{
1544 NPCATT_LEGACY_1, NPCATT_LEGACY_2, NPCATT_LEGACY_3,
1545 NPCATT_LEGACY_4, NPCATT_LEGACY_5, NPCATT_LEGACY_6
1546 }
1547 };
1548 if( legacy_attitudes.count( attitude ) > 0 ) {
1549 previous_attitude = NPCATT_NULL;
1550 }
1551 }
1552
1553 if( data.read( "comp_mission_id", comp_miss_id ) ) {
1554 comp_mission.mission_id = comp_miss_id;
1555 }
1556
1557 if( data.read( "comp_mission_pt", comp_miss_pt ) ) {
1558 comp_mission.position = comp_miss_pt;
1559 }
1560
1561 if( data.read( "comp_mission_role", comp_miss_role ) ) {
1562 comp_mission.role_id = comp_miss_role;
1563 }
1564
1565 if( data.read( "companion_mission_role_id", companion_mission_role ) ) {
1566 companion_mission_role_id = companion_mission_role;
1567 }
1568
1569 std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> companion_mission_pts;
1570 data.read( "companion_mission_points", companion_mission_pts );
1571 if( !companion_mission_pts.empty() ) {
1572 for( auto pt : companion_mission_pts ) {
1573 companion_mission_points.push_back( pt );
1574 }
1575 }
1576
1577 if( !data.read( "companion_mission_time", companion_mission_t ) ) {
1578 companion_mission_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
1579 } else {
1580 companion_mission_time = companion_mission_t;
1581 }
1582
1583 if( !data.read( "companion_mission_time_ret", companion_mission_t_r ) ) {
1584 companion_mission_time_ret = calendar::before_time_starts;
1585 } else {
1586 companion_mission_time_ret = companion_mission_t_r;
1587 }
1588
1589 companion_mission_inv.clear();
1590 if( data.has_member( "companion_mission_inv" ) ) {
1591 JsonIn *invin_mission = data.get_raw( "companion_mission_inv" );
1592 companion_mission_inv.json_load_items( *invin_mission );
1593 }
1594
1595 if( !data.read( "restock", restock ) ) {
1596 restock = calendar::before_time_starts;
1597 }
1598
1599 data.read( "op_of_u", op_of_u );
1600 data.read( "chatbin", chatbin );
1601 if( !data.read( "rules", rules ) ) {
1602 data.read( "misc_rules", rules );
1603 data.read( "combat_rules", rules );
1604 }
1605 real_weapon = item( "null", calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
1606 data.read( "real_weapon", real_weapon );
1607 cbm_weapon_index = -1;
1608 data.read( "cbm_weapon_index", cbm_weapon_index );
1609
1610 if( !data.read( "last_updated", last_updated ) ) {
1611 last_updated = calendar::turn;
1612 }
1613 complaints.clear();
1614 data.read( "complaints", complaints );
1615}
1616
1617/*
1618 * save npc
1619 */
1620void npc::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1621{
1622 json.start_object();
1623 // This must be after the json object has been started, so any super class
1624 // puts their data into the same json object.
1625 store( json );
1626 json.end_object();
1627}
1628
1629void npc::store( JsonOut &json ) const
1630{
1631 player::store( json );
1632
1633 json.member( "name", name );
1634 json.member( "marked_for_death", marked_for_death );
1635 json.member( "dead", dead );
1636 json.member( "patience", patience );
1637 json.member( "myclass", myclass.str() );
1638 json.member( "known_to_u", known_to_u );
1639 json.member( "personality", personality );
1640
1641 json.member( "submap_coords", submap_coords );
1642
1643 json.member( "last_player_seen_pos", last_player_seen_pos );
1644
1645 json.member( "goalx", goal.x() );
1646 json.member( "goaly", goal.y() );
1647 json.member( "goalz", goal.z() );
1648
1649 json.member( "guardx", guard_pos.x );
1650 json.member( "guardy", guard_pos.y );
1651 json.member( "guardz", guard_pos.z );
1652 json.member( "current_activity_id", current_activity_id.str() );
1653 json.member( "pulp_location", pulp_location );
1654 json.member( "assigned_camp", assigned_camp );
1655 json.member( "chair_pos", chair_pos );
1656 json.member( "wander_pos", wander_pos );
1657 json.member( "job", job );
1658 // TODO: stringid
1659 json.member( "mission", mission );
1660 json.member( "previous_mission", previous_mission );
1661 json.member( "faction_api_ver", faction_api_version );
1662 if( !fac_id.str().empty() ) { // set in constructor
1663 json.member( "my_fac", fac_id.c_str() );
1664 }
1665 json.member( "attitude", static_cast<int>( attitude ) );
1666 json.member( "previous_attitude", static_cast<int>( previous_attitude ) );
1667 json.member( "op_of_u", op_of_u );
1668 json.member( "chatbin", chatbin );
1669 json.member( "rules", rules );
1670
1671 if( !real_weapon.is_null() ) {
1672 json.member( "real_weapon", real_weapon ); // also saves contents
1673 }
1674 json.member( "cbm_weapon_index", cbm_weapon_index );
1675
1676 json.member( "comp_mission_id", comp_mission.mission_id );
1677 json.member( "comp_mission_pt", comp_mission.position );
1678 json.member( "comp_mission_role", comp_mission.role_id );
1679 json.member( "companion_mission_role_id", companion_mission_role_id );
1680 json.member( "companion_mission_points", companion_mission_points );
1681 json.member( "companion_mission_time", companion_mission_time );
1682 json.member( "companion_mission_time_ret", companion_mission_time_ret );
1683 json.member( "companion_mission_inv" );
1684 companion_mission_inv.json_save_items( json );
1685 json.member( "restock", restock );
1686
1687 json.member( "last_updated", last_updated );
1688 json.member( "complaints", complaints );
1689}

1691////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1692///// inventory.h
1693/*
1694 * Save invlet cache
1695 */
1696void inventory::json_save_invcache( JsonOut &json ) const
1697{
1698 json.start_array();
1699 for( const auto &elem : invlet_cache.get_invlets_by_id() ) {
1700 json.start_object();
1701 json.member( elem.first.str() );
1702 json.start_array();
1703 for( const auto &_sym : elem.second ) {
1704 json.write( static_cast<int>( _sym ) );
1705 }
1706 json.end_array();
1707 json.end_object();
1708 }
1709 json.end_array();
1710}
1711
1712/*
1713 * Invlet cache: player specific, thus not wrapped in inventory::json_load/save
1714 */
1715void inventory::json_load_invcache( JsonIn &jsin )
1716{
1717 try {
1718 std::unordered_map<itype_id, std::string> map;
1719 for( JsonObject jo : jsin.get_array() ) {
1720 jo.allow_omitted_members();
1721 for( const JsonMember member : jo ) {
1722 std::string invlets;
1723 for( const int i : member.get_array() ) {
1724 invlets.push_back( i );
1725 }
1726 map[itype_id( member.name() )] = invlets;
1727 }
1728 }
1729 invlet_cache = { map };
1730 } catch( const JsonError &jsonerr ) {
1731 debugmsg( "bad invcache json:\n%s", jsonerr.c_str() );
1732 }
1733}
1734
1735/*
1736 * save all items. Just this->items, invlet cache saved separately
1737 */
1738void inventory::json_save_items( JsonOut &json ) const
1739{
1740 json.start_array();
1741 for( const auto &elem : items ) {
1742 for( const auto &elem_stack_iter : elem ) {
1743 elem_stack_iter.serialize( json );
1744 }
1745 }
1746 json.end_array();
1747}
1748
1749void inventory::json_load_items( JsonIn &jsin )
1750{
1751 jsin.start_array();
1752 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
1753 item tmp;
1754 tmp.deserialize( jsin );
1755 add_item( tmp, true, false );
1756 }
1757}
1758
1759////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1760///// monster.h
1761
1762void monster::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
1763{
1764 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1765 data.allow_omitted_members();
1766 load( data );
1767}
1768
1769void monster::load( const JsonObject &data )
1770{
1771 Creature::load( data );
1772
1773 std::string sidtmp;
1774 // load->str->int
1775 data.read( "typeid", sidtmp );
1776 type = &mtype_id( sidtmp ).obj();
1777
1778 data.read( "unique_name", unique_name );
1779 data.read( "posx", position.x );
1780 data.read( "posy", position.y );
1781 if( !data.read( "posz", position.z ) ) {
1782 position.z = g->get_levz();
1783 }
1784
1785 data.read( "wandf", wandf );
1786 data.read( "wandx", wander_pos.x );
1787 data.read( "wandy", wander_pos.y );
1788 if( data.read( "wandz", wander_pos.z ) ) {
1789 wander_pos.z = position.z;
1790 }
1791 if( data.has_object( "tied_item" ) ) {
1792 JsonIn *tied_item_json = data.get_raw( "tied_item" );
1793 item newitem;
1794 newitem.deserialize( *tied_item_json );
1795 tied_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1796 }
1797 if( data.has_object( "tack_item" ) ) {
1798 JsonIn *tack_item_json = data.get_raw( "tack_item" );
1799 item newitem;
1800 newitem.deserialize( *tack_item_json );
1801 tack_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1802 }
1803 if( data.has_object( "armor_item" ) ) {
1804 JsonIn *armor_item_json = data.get_raw( "armor_item" );
1805 item newitem;
1806 newitem.deserialize( *armor_item_json );
1807 armor_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1808 }
1809 if( data.has_object( "storage_item" ) ) {
1810 JsonIn *storage_item_json = data.get_raw( "storage_item" );
1811 item newitem;
1812 newitem.deserialize( *storage_item_json );
1813 storage_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1814 }
1815 if( data.has_object( "battery_item" ) ) {
1816 JsonIn *battery_item_json = data.get_raw( "battery_item" );
1817 item newitem;
1818 newitem.deserialize( *battery_item_json );
1819 battery_item = cata::make_value<item>( newitem );
1820 }
1821 data.read( "hp", hp );
1822
1823 // sp_timeout indicates an old save, prior to the special_attacks refactor
1824 if( data.has_array( "sp_timeout" ) ) {
1825 JsonArray parray = data.get_array( "sp_timeout" );
1826 size_t index = 0;
1827 int ptimeout = 0;
1828 while( parray.has_more() && index < type->special_attacks_names.size() ) {
1829 if( parray.read_next( ptimeout ) ) {
1830 // assume timeouts saved in same order as current monsters.json listing
1831 const std::string &aname = type->special_attacks_names[index++];
1832 auto &entry = special_attacks[aname];
1833 if( ptimeout >= 0 ) {
1834 entry.cooldown = ptimeout;
1835 } else { // -1 means disabled, unclear what <-1 values mean in old saves
1836 entry.cooldown = type->special_attacks.at( aname )->cooldown;
1837 entry.enabled = false;
1838 }
1839 }
1840 }
1841 }
1842
1843 // special_attacks indicates a save after the special_attacks refactor
1844 if( data.has_object( "special_attacks" ) ) {
1845 for( const JsonMember member : data.get_object( "special_attacks" ) ) {
1846 JsonObject saobject = member.get_object();
1847 saobject.allow_omitted_members();
1848 auto &entry = special_attacks[member.name()];
1849 entry.cooldown = saobject.get_int( "cooldown" );
1850 entry.enabled = saobject.get_bool( "enabled" );
1851 }
1852 }
1853
1854 // make sure the loaded monster has every special attack its type says it should have
1855 for( auto &sa : type->special_attacks ) {
1856 const std::string &aname = sa.first;
1857 if( special_attacks.find( aname ) == special_attacks.end() ) {
1858 auto &entry = special_attacks[aname];
1859 entry.cooldown = rng( 0, sa.second->cooldown );
1860 }
1861 }
1862
1863 data.read( "friendly", friendly );
1864 data.read( "mission_id", mission_id );
1865 data.read( "no_extra_death_drops", no_extra_death_drops );
1866 data.read( "dead", dead );
1867 data.read( "anger", anger );
1868 data.read( "morale", morale );
1869 data.read( "hallucination", hallucination );
1870 data.read( "stairscount", staircount ); // really?
1871 data.read( "fish_population", fish_population );
1872 // Load legacy plans.
1873 std::vector<tripoint> plans;
1874 data.read( "plans", plans );
1875 if( !plans.empty() ) {
1876 goal = plans.back();
1877 }
1878
1879 data.read( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
1880
1881 // This is relative to the monster so it isn't invalidated by map shifting.
1882 tripoint destination;
1883 data.read( "destination", destination );
1884 goal = pos() + destination;
1885
1886 upgrades = data.get_bool( "upgrades", type->upgrades );
1887 upgrade_time = data.get_int( "upgrade_time", -1 );
1888
1889 reproduces = data.get_bool( "reproduces", type->reproduces );
1890 baby_timer.reset();
1891 data.read( "baby_timer", baby_timer );
1892 if( baby_timer && *baby_timer == calendar::before_time_starts ) {
1893 baby_timer.reset();
1894 }
1895
1896 data.read( "udder_timer", udder_timer );
1897
1898 horde_attraction = static_cast<monster_horde_attraction>( data.get_int( "horde_attraction", 0 ) );
1899
1900 data.read( "inv", inv );
1901 data.read( "corpse_components", corpse_components );
1902 data.read( "dragged_foe_id", dragged_foe_id );
1903
1904 if( data.has_int( "ammo" ) && !type->starting_ammo.empty() ) {
1905 // Legacy loading for ammo.
1906 normalize_ammo( data.get_int( "ammo" ) );
1907 } else {
1908 data.read( "ammo", ammo );
1909 // legacy loading for milkable creatures, fix mismatch.
1910 if( has_flag( MF_MILKABLE ) && !type->starting_ammo.empty() && !ammo.empty() &&
1911 type->starting_ammo.begin()->first != ammo.begin()->first ) {
1912 const itype_id old_type = ammo.begin()->first;
1913 const int old_value = ammo.begin()->second;
1914 ammo[type->starting_ammo.begin()->first] = old_value;
1915 ammo.erase( old_type );
1916 }
1917 }
1918
1919 faction = mfaction_str_id( data.get_string( "faction", "" ) );
1920 if( !data.read( "last_updated", last_updated ) ) {
1921 last_updated = calendar::turn;
1922 }
1923 data.read( "mounted_player_id", mounted_player_id );
1924 data.read( "path", path );
1925}
1926
1927/*
1928 * Save, json ed; serialization that won't break as easily. In theory.
1929 */
1930void monster::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
1931{
1932 json.start_object();
1933 // This must be after the json object has been started, so any super class
1934 // puts their data into the same json object.
1935 store( json );
1936 json.end_object();
1937}

1943 json.member( "unique_name", unique_name );

1945 json.member( "posy", position.y );
1946 json.member( "posz", position.z );

1948 json.member( "wandy", wander_pos.y );
1949 json.member( "wandz", wander_pos.z );

1951 json.member( "hp", hp );

1954 json.member( "fish_population", fish_population );
1955 json.member( "faction", faction.id().str() );
1956 json.member( "mission_id", mission_id );
1957 json.member( "no_extra_death_drops", no_extra_death_drops );
1958 json.member( "dead", dead );
1959 json.member( "anger", anger );
1960 json.member( "morale", morale );
1961 json.member( "hallucination", hallucination );
1962 json.member( "stairscount", staircount );
1963 if( tied_item ) {
1964 json.member( "tied_item", *tied_item );
1965 }
1966 if( tack_item ) {
1967 json.member( "tack_item", *tack_item );
1968 }
1969 if( armor_item ) {
1970 json.member( "armor_item", *armor_item );
1971 }
1972 if( storage_item ) {
1973 json.member( "storage_item", *storage_item );
1974 }
1975 if( battery_item ) {
1976 json.member( "battery_item", *battery_item );
1977 }
1978 // Store the relative position of the goal so it loads correctly after a map shift.
1979 json.member( "destination", goal - pos() );
1980 json.member( "ammo", ammo );
1981 json.member( "underwater", underwater );
1982 json.member( "upgrades", upgrades );
1983 json.member( "upgrade_time", upgrade_time );
1984 json.member( "last_updated", last_updated );
1985 json.member( "reproduces", reproduces );
1986 json.member( "baby_timer", baby_timer );
1987 json.member( "udder_timer", udder_timer );
1988
1989 json.member( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
1990
1991 if( horde_attraction > MHA_NULL && horde_attraction < NUM_MONSTER_HORDE_ATTRACTION ) {
1992 json.member( "horde_attraction", horde_attraction );
1993 }
1994 json.member( "inv", inv );
1995 json.member( "corpse_components", corpse_components );
1996
1997 json.member( "dragged_foe_id", dragged_foe_id );
1998 // storing the rider
1999 json.member( "mounted_player_id", mounted_player_id );
2000 json.member( "path", path );
2001}

2064// Template parameter because item::craft_data is private and I don't want to make it public.
2065template<typename T>
2066static void load_legacy_craft_data( io::JsonObjectInputArchive &archive, T &value )
2067{
2068 archive.allow_omitted_members();
2069 if( archive.has_member( "making" ) ) {
2070 value = cata::make_value<typename T::element_type>();
2071 value->deserialize( archive );
2072 }
2073}

2078{
2079}

2081namespace charge_removal_blacklist
2082{
2083static std::set<itype_id> removal_list;
2084
2085const std::set<itype_id> &get()
2086{
2087 return removal_list;
2088}
2089void load( const JsonObject &jo )
2090{
2091 std::set<std::string> d = jo.get_tags( "list" );
2092 for( const std::string &s : d ) {
2093 removal_list.insert( itype_id( s ) );
2094 }
2095}
2096void reset()
2097{
2098 removal_list.clear();
2099}
2100} // namespace charge_removal_blacklist
2101
2102namespace to_cbc_migration
2103{
2104static std::set<itype_id> the_list;
2105
2106void load( const JsonObject &jo )
2107{
2108 std::set<std::string> d = jo.get_tags( "list" );
2109 for( const std::string &s : d ) {
2110 the_list.insert( itype_id( s ) );
2111 }
2112}
2113
2114void reset()
2115{
2116 the_list.clear();
2117}
2118
2119static bool migration_required( const item &i )
2120{
2121 if( !i.count_by_charges() ) {
2122 return false;
2123 }
2124 return the_list.count( i.typeId() ) > 0;
2125}
2126
2127/**
2128 * Merge old individual items into new count-by-charges items with same id.
2129 */
2130static void migrate( cata::colony<item> &stack )
2131{
2132 for( auto it_src = stack.begin(); it_src != stack.end(); ) {
2133 if( !migration_required( *it_src ) ) {
2134 it_src++;
2135 continue;
2136 }
2137 auto it_dst = it_src;
2138 it_dst++;
2139 bool merged = false;
2140 for( ; it_dst != stack.end(); it_dst++ ) {
2141 const item &src = *it_src;
2142 if( it_dst->merge_charges( src ) ) {
2143 it_src = stack.erase( it_src );
2144 merged = true;
2145 break;
2146 }
2147 }
2148 if( !merged ) {
2149 it_src++;
2150 }
2151 }
2152}
2153} // namespace to_cbc_migration
2154
2155template<typename Archive>
2156void item::io( Archive &archive )
2157{
2158
2159 itype_id orig; // original ID as loaded from JSON
2160 const auto load_type = [&]( const std::string & id ) {
2161 orig = itype_id( id );
2162 convert( item_controller->migrate_id( orig ) );
2163 };
2164
2165 const auto load_curammo = [this]( const std::string & id ) {
2166 curammo = &*item_controller->migrate_id( itype_id( id ) );
2167 };
2168 const auto load_corpse = [this]( const std::string & id ) {
2169 if( itype_id( id ).is_null() ) {
2170 // backwards compatibility, nullptr should not be stored at all
2171 corpse = nullptr;
2172 } else {
2173 corpse = &mtype_id( id ).obj();
2174 }
2175 };
2176 archive.template io<const itype>( "typeid", type, load_type, []( const itype & i ) {
2177 return i.get_id().str();
2178 }, io::required_tag() );
2179
2180 // normalize legacy saves to always have charges >= 0
2181 archive.io( "charges", charges, 0 );
2182 charges = std::max( charges, 0 );
2183
2184 archive.io( "energy", energy, 0_J );
2185
2186 archive.io( "burnt", burnt, 0 );
2187 archive.io( "poison", poison, 0 );
2188 archive.io( "frequency", frequency, 0 );
2189 archive.io( "snip_id", snip_id, snippet_id::NULL_ID() );
2190 // NB! field is named `irridation` in legacy files
2191 archive.io( "irridation", irradiation, 0 );
2192 archive.io( "bday", bday, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
2193 archive.io( "mission_id", mission_id, -1 );
2194 archive.io( "player_id", player_id, -1 );
2195 archive.io( "item_vars", item_vars, io::empty_default_tag() );
2196 // TODO: change default to empty string
2197 archive.io( "name", corpse_name, std::string() );
2198 archive.io( "owner", owner, owner.NULL_ID() );
2199 archive.io( "old_owner", old_owner, old_owner.NULL_ID() );
2200 archive.io( "invlet", invlet, '\0' );
2201 archive.io( "damaged", damage_, 0 );
2202 archive.io( "active", active, false );
2203 archive.io( "is_favorite", is_favorite, false );
2204 archive.io( "item_counter", item_counter, static_cast<decltype( item_counter )>( 0 ) );
2205 archive.io( "rot", rot, 0_turns );
2206 archive.io( "last_rot_check", last_rot_check, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
2207 archive.io( "techniques", techniques, io::empty_default_tag() );
2208 archive.io( "faults", faults, io::empty_default_tag() );
2209 archive.io( "item_tags", item_tags, io::empty_default_tag() );
2210 archive.io( "components", components, io::empty_default_tag() );
2211 archive.io( "recipe_charges", recipe_charges, 1 );
2212 archive.template io<const itype>( "curammo", curammo, load_curammo,
2213 []( const itype & i ) {
2214 return i.get_id().str();
2215 } );
2216 archive.template io<const mtype>( "corpse", corpse, load_corpse,
2217 []( const mtype & i ) {
2218 return i.id.str();
2219 } );
2220 archive.io( "craft_data", craft_data_, decltype( craft_data_ )() );
2221 archive.io( "light", light.luminance, nolight.luminance );
2222 archive.io( "light_width", light.width, nolight.width );
2223 archive.io( "light_dir", light.direction, nolight.direction );
2224
2225 static const cata::value_ptr<relic> null_relic_ptr = nullptr;
2226 archive.io( "relic_data", relic_data, null_relic_ptr );
2227
2228 archive.io( "drop_token", drop_token, decltype( drop_token )() );
2229
2230 item_controller->migrate_item( orig, *this );
2231
2232 if( !Archive::is_input::value ) {
2233 return;
2234 }
2235 /* Loading has finished, following code is to ensure consistency and fixes bugs in saves. */
2236
2237 load_legacy_craft_data( archive, craft_data_ );
2238
2239 double float_damage = 0;
2240 if( archive.read( "damage", float_damage ) ) {
2241 damage_ = std::min( std::max( min_damage(),
2242 static_cast<int>( float_damage * itype::damage_scale ) ),
2243 max_damage() );
2244 }
2245
2246 int note = 0;
2247 const bool note_read = archive.read( "note", note );
2248
2249 // Old saves used to only contain one of those values (stored under "poison"), it would be
2250 // loaded into a union of those members. Now they are separate members and must be set separately.
2251 if( poison != 0 && note == 0 && !type->snippet_category.empty() ) {
2252 std::swap( note, poison );
2253 }
2254 if( poison != 0 && frequency == 0 && ( typeId() == itype_radio_on || typeId() == itype_radio ) ) {
2255 std::swap( frequency, poison );
2256 }
2257 if( poison != 0 && irradiation == 0 && typeId() == itype_rad_badge ) {
2258 std::swap( irradiation, poison );
2259 }
2260
2261 // erase all invalid flags (not defined in flags.json), display warning about invalid flags
2262 erase_if( item_tags, [&]( const std::string & f ) {
2263 if( !json_flag::get( f ).id.is_valid() ) {
2264 debugmsg( "item of type '%s' was loaded with undefined flag '%s'.", typeId().c_str(), f );
2265 return true;
2266 } else {
2267 return false;
2268 }
2269 } );
2270
2271 if( note_read ) {
2272 snip_id = SNIPPET.migrate_hash_to_id( note );
2273 } else {
2274 cata::optional<std::string> snip;
2275 if( archive.read( "snippet_id", snip ) && snip ) {
2276 snip_id = snippet_id( snip.value() );
2277 }
2278 }
2279
2280 // Compatibility for item type changes: for example soap changed from being a generic item
2281 // (item::charges -1 or 0 or anything else) to comestible (and thereby counted by charges),
2282 // old saves still have invalid charges, this fixes the charges value to the default charges.
2283 if( count_by_charges() && charges <= 0 ) {
2284 charges = item( type, calendar::start_of_cataclysm ).charges;
2285 }
2286 if( is_food() ) {
2287 active = true;
2288 }
2289 if( !active && item_tags.count( "WET" ) > 0 ) {
2290 // Some wet items from legacy saves may be inactive
2291 active = true;
2292 }
2293 std::string mode;
2294 if( archive.read( "mode", mode ) ) {
2295 // only for backward compatibility (nowadays mode is stored in item_vars)
2296 gun_set_mode( gun_mode_id( mode ) );
2297 }
2298
2299 // Books without any chapters don't need to store a remaining-chapters
2300 // counter, it will always be 0 and it prevents proper stacking.
2301 if( get_chapters() == 0 ) {
2302 for( auto it = item_vars.begin(); it != item_vars.end(); ) {
2303 if( it->first.compare( 0, 19, "remaining-chapters-" ) == 0 ) {
2304 item_vars.erase( it++ );
2305 } else {
2306 ++it;
2307 }
2308 }
2309 }
2310
2311 // Remove stored translated gerund in favor of storing the inscription tool type
2312 item_vars.erase( "item_label_type" );
2313 item_vars.erase( "item_note_type" );
2314
2315 // Activate corpses from old saves
2316 if( is_corpse() && !active ) {
2317 active = true;
2318 }
2319
2320 if( charges != 0 && !type->can_have_charges() ) {
2321 // Types that are known to have charges, but should not have them.
2322 // We fix it here, but it's expected from bugged saves and does not require a message.
2323 if( charge_removal_blacklist::get().count( type->get_id() ) == 0 ) {
2324 debugmsg( "Item %s was loaded with charges, but can not have any!", type->get_id() );
2325 }
2326 charges = 0;
2327 }
2328
2329 // Relic check. Kinda late, but that's how relics have to be
2330 if( relic_data ) {
2331 relic_data->check();
2332 }
2333}
2334
2335void item::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2336{
2337 const JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2338 data.allow_omitted_members();
2339 io::JsonObjectInputArchive archive( data );
2340 io( archive );
2341 // made for fast forwarding time from 0.D to 0.E
2342 if( savegame_loading_version < 27 ) {
2343 legacy_fast_forward_time();
2344 }
2345 if( data.has_array( "contents" ) ) {
2346 std::list<item> items;
2347 data.read( "contents", items );
2348 contents = item_contents( items );
2349 } else {
2350 data.read( "contents", contents );
2351 }
2352
2353 // Sealed item migration: items with "unseals_into" set should always have contents
2354 if( contents.empty() && is_non_resealable_container() ) {
2355 convert( type->container->unseals_into );
2356 }
2357}
2358
2359void item::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2360{
2361 io::JsonObjectOutputArchive archive( json );
2362 const_cast<item *>( this )->io( archive );
2363 if( !contents.empty() ) {
2364 json.member( "contents", contents );
2365 }
2366}

2368////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2369///// vehicle.h
2370
2371/*
2372 * vehicle_part
2373 */
2374void vehicle_part::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2375{
2376 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2377 data.allow_omitted_members();
2378 vpart_id pid;
2379 data.read( "id", pid );
2380
2381 std::map<std::string, std::pair<std::string, std::string>> deprecated = {
2382 { "laser_gun", { "laser_rifle", "none" } },
2383 { "seat_nocargo", { "seat", "none" } },
2384 { "engine_plasma", { "minireactor", "none" } },
2385 { "battery_truck", { "battery_car", "battery" } },
2386
2387 { "diesel_tank_little", { "tank_little", "diesel" } },
2388 { "diesel_tank_small", { "tank_small", "diesel" } },
2389 { "diesel_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "diesel" } },
2390 { "diesel_tank", { "tank", "diesel" } },
2391 { "external_diesel_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "diesel" } },
2392 { "external_diesel_tank", { "external_tank", "diesel" } },
2393
2394 { "gas_tank_little", { "tank_little", "gasoline" } },
2395 { "gas_tank_small", { "tank_small", "gasoline" } },
2396 { "gas_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "gasoline" } },
2397 { "gas_tank", { "tank", "gasoline" } },
2398 { "external_gas_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "gasoline" } },
2399 { "external_gas_tank", { "external_tank", "gasoline" } },
2400
2401 { "water_dirty_tank_little", { "tank_little", "water" } },
2402 { "water_dirty_tank_small", { "tank_small", "water" } },
2403 { "water_dirty_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "water" } },
2404 { "water_dirty_tank", { "tank", "water" } },
2405 { "external_water_dirty_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "water" } },
2406 { "external_water_dirty_tank", { "external_tank", "water" } },
2407 { "dirty_water_tank_barrel", { "tank_barrel", "water" } },
2408
2409 { "water_tank_little", { "tank_little", "water_clean" } },
2410 { "water_tank_small", { "tank_small", "water_clean" } },
2411 { "water_tank_medium", { "tank_medium", "water_clean" } },
2412 { "water_tank", { "tank", "water_clean" } },
2413 { "external_water_tank_small", { "external_tank_small", "water_clean" } },
2414 { "external_water_tank", { "external_tank", "water_clean" } },
2415 { "water_tank_barrel", { "tank_barrel", "water_clean" } },
2416
2417 { "napalm_tank", { "tank", "napalm" } },
2418
2419 { "hydrogen_tank", { "tank", "none" } }
2420 };
2421
2422 // required for compatibility with 0.C saves
2423 itype_id legacy_fuel;
2424
2425 auto dep = deprecated.find( pid.str() );
2426 if( dep != deprecated.end() ) {
2427 pid = vpart_id( dep->second.first );
2428 legacy_fuel = itype_id( dep->second.second );
2429 }
2430
2431 // if we don't know what type of part it is, it'll cause problems later.
2432 if( !pid.is_valid() ) {
2433 if( pid.str() == "wheel_underbody" ) {
2434 pid = vpart_id( "wheel_wide" );
2435 } else {
2436 data.throw_error( "bad vehicle part", "id" );
2437 }
2438 }
2439 id = pid;
2440
2441 if( data.has_object( "base" ) ) {
2442 data.read( "base", base );
2443 } else {
2444 // handle legacy format which didn't include the base item
2445 base = item( id.obj().item );
2446 }
2447
2448 data.read( "mount_dx", mount.x );
2449 data.read( "mount_dy", mount.y );
2450 data.read( "open", open );
2451 int direction_int;
2452 data.read( "direction", direction_int );
2453 direction = units::from_degrees( direction_int );
2454 data.read( "blood", blood );
2455 data.read( "proxy_part_id", proxy_part_id );
2456 data.read( "proxy_sym", proxy_sym );
2457 data.read( "enabled", enabled );
2458 data.read( "flags", flags );
2459 data.read( "passenger_id", passenger_id );
2460 if( data.has_int( "z_offset" ) ) {
2461 int z_offset = data.get_int( "z_offset" );
2462 if( std::abs( z_offset ) > 10 ) {
2463 data.throw_error( "z_offset out of range", "z_offset" );
2464 }
2465 precalc[0].z = z_offset;
2466 precalc[1].z = z_offset;
2467 }
2468 JsonArray ja = data.get_array( "carry" );
2469 size_t sz = ja.size();
2470 for( size_t index = 0; index < sz; index++ ) {
2471 carry_names.push( ja.get_string( sz - index - 1 ) );
2472 }
2473 data.read( "crew_id", crew_id );
2474 data.read( "items", items );
2475 data.read( "target_first_x", target.first.x );
2476 data.read( "target_first_y", target.first.y );
2477 data.read( "target_first_z", target.first.z );
2478 data.read( "target_second_x", target.second.x );
2479 data.read( "target_second_y", target.second.y );
2480 data.read( "target_second_z", target.second.z );
2481 data.read( "ammo_pref", ammo_pref );
2482
2483 if( legacy_fuel.is_empty() ) {
2484 legacy_fuel = id.obj().fuel_type;
2485 }
2486
2487 // with VEHICLE tag migrate fuel tanks only if amount field exists
2488 if( base.has_flag( "VEHICLE" ) ) {
2489 if( data.has_int( "amount" ) && ammo_capacity() > 0 && legacy_fuel != itype_battery ) {
2490 ammo_set( legacy_fuel, data.get_int( "amount" ) );
2491 }
2492
2493 // without VEHICLE flag always migrate both batteries and fuel tanks
2494 } else {
2495 if( ammo_capacity() > 0 ) {
2496 ammo_set( legacy_fuel, data.get_int( "amount" ) );
2497 }
2498 base.item_tags.insert( "VEHICLE" );
2499 }
2500
2501 if( data.has_int( "hp" ) && id.obj().durability > 0 ) {
2502 // migrate legacy savegames exploiting that all base items at that time had max_damage() of 4
2503 base.set_damage( 4 * itype::damage_scale - 4 * itype::damage_scale * data.get_int( "hp" ) /
2504 id.obj().durability );
2505 }
2506
2507 // legacy turrets loaded ammo via a pseudo CARGO space
2508 if( is_turret() && !items.empty() ) {
2509 const int qty = std::accumulate( items.begin(), items.end(), 0, []( int lhs, const item & rhs ) {
2510 return lhs + rhs.charges;
2511 } );
2512 ammo_set( items.begin()->ammo_current(), qty );
2513 items.clear();
2514 }
2515}
2516
2517void vehicle_part::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2518{
2519 json.start_object();
2520 json.member( "id", id.str() );
2521 json.member( "base", base );
2522 json.member( "mount_dx", mount.x );
2523 json.member( "mount_dy", mount.y );
2524 json.member( "open", open );
2525 json.member( "direction", std::lround( to_degrees( direction ) ) );
2526 json.member( "blood", blood );
2527 json.member( "proxy_part_id", proxy_part_id );
2528 json.member( "proxy_sym", proxy_sym );
2529 json.member( "enabled", enabled );
2530 json.member( "flags", flags );
2531 if( !carry_names.empty() ) {
2532 std::stack<std::string, std::vector<std::string> > carry_copy = carry_names;
2533 json.member( "carry" );
2534 json.start_array();
2535 while( !carry_copy.empty() ) {
2536 json.write( carry_copy.top() );
2537 carry_copy.pop();
2538 }
2539 json.end_array();
2540 }
2541 json.member( "passenger_id", passenger_id );
2542 json.member( "crew_id", crew_id );
2543 if( precalc[0].z ) {
2544 json.member( "z_offset", precalc[0].z );
2545 }
2546 json.member( "items", items );
2547 if( target.first != tripoint_min ) {
2548 json.member( "target_first_x", target.first.x );
2549 json.member( "target_first_y", target.first.y );
2550 json.member( "target_first_z", target.first.z );
2551 }
2552 if( target.second != tripoint_min ) {
2553 json.member( "target_second_x", target.second.x );
2554 json.member( "target_second_y", target.second.y );
2555 json.member( "target_second_z", target.second.z );
2556 }
2557 json.member( "ammo_pref", ammo_pref );
2558 json.end_object();
2559}
