2582/*
2583 * Load vehicle from a json blob that might just exceed player in size.
2584 */
2585void vehicle::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2586{
2587 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2588 data.allow_omitted_members();
2589
2590 int fdir = 0;
2591 int mdir = 0;
2592
2593 data.read( "type", type );
2594 data.read( "posx", pos.x );
2595 data.read( "posy", pos.y );
2596 data.read( "om_id", om_id );
2597 data.read( "faceDir", fdir );
2598 data.read( "moveDir", mdir );
2599 int turn_dir_int;
2600 data.read( "turn_dir", turn_dir_int );
2601 turn_dir = units::from_degrees( turn_dir_int );
2602 data.read( "velocity", velocity );
2603 data.read( "falling", is_falling );
2604 data.read( "floating", is_floating );
2605 data.read( "flying", is_flying );
2606 data.read( "cruise_velocity", cruise_velocity );
2607 data.read( "vertical_velocity", vertical_velocity );
2608 data.read( "cruise_on", cruise_on );
2609 data.read( "engine_on", engine_on );
2610 data.read( "tracking_on", tracking_on );
2611 data.read( "skidding", skidding );
2612 data.read( "of_turn_carry", of_turn_carry );
2613 data.read( "is_locked", is_locked );
2614 data.read( "is_alarm_on", is_alarm_on );
2615 data.read( "camera_on", camera_on );
2616 if( !data.read( "last_update_turn", last_update ) ) {
2617 last_update = calendar::turn;
2618 }
2619
2620 units::angle fdir_angle = units::from_degrees( fdir );
2621 face.init( fdir_angle );
2622 move.init( units::from_degrees( mdir ) );
2623 data.read( "name", name );
2624 std::string temp_id;
2625 std::string temp_old_id;
2626 data.read( "owner", temp_id );
2627 data.read( "old_owner", temp_old_id );
2628 // for savegames before the change to faction_id for ownership.
2629 if( temp_id.empty() ) {
2630 owner = faction_id::NULL_ID();
2631 } else {
2632 owner = faction_id( temp_id );
2633 }
2634 if( temp_old_id.empty() ) {
2635 old_owner = faction_id::NULL_ID();
2636 } else {
2637 old_owner = faction_id( temp_old_id );
2638 }
2639 data.read( "theft_time", theft_time );
2640
2641 data.read( "parts", parts );
2642 // we persist the pivot anchor so that if the rules for finding
2643 // the pivot change, existing vehicles do not shift around.
2644 // Loading vehicles that predate the pivot logic is a special
2645 // case of this, they will load with an anchor of (0,0) which
2646 // is what they're expecting.
2647 data.read( "pivot", pivot_anchor[0] );
2648 pivot_anchor[1] = pivot_anchor[0];
2649 pivot_rotation[1] = pivot_rotation[0] = fdir_angle;
2650 data.read( "is_following", is_following );
2651 data.read( "is_patrolling", is_patrolling );
2652 data.read( "autodrive_local_target", autodrive_local_target );
2653 data.read( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
2654 data.read( "magic", magic );
2655
2656 // Loose items -> count-by-charges migration
2657 for( vehicle_part &part : parts ) {
2658 to_cbc_migration::migrate( part.items );
2659 }
2660
2661 // Need to manually backfill the active item cache since the part loader can't call its vehicle.
2662 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( VPFLAG_CARGO ) ) {
2663 auto it = vp.part().items.begin();
2664 auto end = vp.part().items.end();
2665 for( ; it != end; ++it ) {
2666 if( it->needs_processing() ) {
2667 active_items.add( *it, vp.mount() );
2668 }
2669 }
2670 }
2671
2672 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "TURRET" ) ) {
2673 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "turret_mount" ), false );
2674
2675 //Forcibly set turrets' targeting mode to manual if no turret control unit is present on turret's tile on loading save
2676 if( !has_part( global_part_pos3( vp.part() ), "TURRET_CONTROLS" ) ) {
2677 vp.part().enabled = false;
2678 }
2679 //Set turret control unit's state equal to turret's targeting mode on loading save
2680 for( const vpart_reference &turret_part : get_any_parts( "TURRET_CONTROLS" ) ) {
2681 turret_part.part().enabled = vp.part().enabled;
2682 }
2683 }
2684
2685 // Add vehicle mounts to cars that are missing them.
2686 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "NEEDS_WHEEL_MOUNT_LIGHT" ) ) {
2687 if( vp.info().has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
2688 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_light_steerable" ), false );
2689 } else {
2690 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_light" ), false );
2691 }
2692 }
2693 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "NEEDS_WHEEL_MOUNT_MEDIUM" ) ) {
2694 if( vp.info().has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
2695 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_medium_steerable" ), false );
2696 } else {
2697 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_medium" ), false );
2698 }
2699 }
2700 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( "NEEDS_WHEEL_MOUNT_HEAVY" ) ) {
2701 if( vp.info().has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
2702 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_heavy_steerable" ), false );
2703 } else {
2704 install_part( vp.mount(), vpart_id( "wheel_mount_heavy" ), false );
2705 }
2706 }
2707
2708 /* After loading, check if the vehicle is from the old rules and is missing
2709 * frames. */
2710 if( savegame_loading_version < 11 ) {
2711 add_missing_frames();
2712 }
2713
2714 // Handle steering changes
2715 if( savegame_loading_version < 25 ) {
2716 add_steerable_wheels();
2717 }
2718
2719 refresh();
2720
2721 data.read( "tags", tags );
2722 data.read( "labels", labels );
2723
2724 point p;
2725 zone_data zd;
2726 for( JsonObject sdata : data.get_array( "zones" ) ) {
2727 sdata.allow_omitted_members();
2728 sdata.read( "point", p );
2729 sdata.read( "zone", zd );
2730 loot_zones.emplace( p, zd );
2731 }
2732 data.read( "other_tow_point", tow_data.other_towing_point );
2733 // Note that it's possible for a vehicle to be loaded midway
2734 // through a turn if the player is driving REALLY fast and their
2735 // own vehicle motion takes them in range. An undefined value for
2736 // on_turn caused occasional weirdness if the undefined value
2737 // happened to be positive.
2738 //
2739 // Setting it to zero means it won't get to move until the start
2740 // of the next turn, which is what happens anyway if it gets
2741 // loaded anywhere but midway through a driving cycle.
2742 //
2743 // Something similar to vehicle::gain_moves() would be ideal, but
2744 // that can't be used as it currently stands because it would also
2745 // make it instantly fire all its turrets upon load.
2746 of_turn = 0;
2747
2748 /** Legacy saved games did not store part enabled status within parts */
2749 const auto set_legacy_state = [&]( const std::string & var, const std::string & flag ) {
2750 if( data.get_bool( var, false ) ) {
2751 for( const vpart_reference &vp : get_any_parts( flag ) ) {
2752 vp.part().enabled = true;
2753 }
2754 }
2755 };
2756
2757 set_legacy_state( "stereo_on", "STEREO" );
2758 set_legacy_state( "chimes_on", "CHIMES" );
2759 set_legacy_state( "fridge_on", "FRIDGE" );
2760 set_legacy_state( "reaper_on", "REAPER" );
2761 set_legacy_state( "planter_on", "PLANTER" );
2762 set_legacy_state( "recharger_on", "RECHARGE" );
2763 set_legacy_state( "scoop_on", "SCOOP" );
2764 set_legacy_state( "plow_on", "PLOW" );
2765 set_legacy_state( "reactor_on", "REACTOR" );
2766}
2767
2768void vehicle::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2769{
2770 json.start_object();
2771 json.member( "type", type );
2772 json.member( "posx", pos.x );
2773 json.member( "posy", pos.y );
2774 json.member( "om_id", om_id );
2775 json.member( "faceDir", std::lround( to_degrees( face.dir() ) ) );
2776 json.member( "moveDir", std::lround( to_degrees( move.dir() ) ) );
2777 json.member( "turn_dir", std::lround( to_degrees( turn_dir ) ) );
2778 json.member( "velocity", velocity );
2779 json.member( "falling", is_falling );
2780 json.member( "floating", is_floating );
2781 json.member( "flying", is_flying );
2782 json.member( "cruise_velocity", cruise_velocity );
2783 json.member( "vertical_velocity", vertical_velocity );
2784 json.member( "cruise_on", cruise_on );
2785 json.member( "engine_on", engine_on );
2786 json.member( "tracking_on", tracking_on );
2787 json.member( "skidding", skidding );
2788 json.member( "of_turn_carry", of_turn_carry );
2789 json.member( "name", name );
2790 json.member( "owner", owner );
2791 json.member( "old_owner", old_owner );
2792 json.member( "theft_time", theft_time );
2793 json.member( "parts", parts );
2794 json.member( "tags", tags );
2795 json.member( "labels", labels );
2796 json.member( "zones" );
2797 json.start_array();
2798 for( auto const &z : loot_zones ) {
2799 json.start_object();
2800 json.member( "point", z.first );
2801 json.member( "zone", z.second );
2802 json.end_object();
2803 }
2804 json.end_array();
2805 tripoint other_tow_temp_point;
2806 if( is_towed() ) {
2807 vehicle *tower = tow_data.get_towed_by();
2808 if( tower ) {
2809 other_tow_temp_point = tower->global_part_pos3( tower->get_tow_part() );
2810 }
2811 }
2812 json.member( "other_tow_point", other_tow_temp_point );
2813
2814 json.member( "is_locked", is_locked );
2815 json.member( "is_alarm_on", is_alarm_on );
2816 json.member( "camera_on", camera_on );
2817 json.member( "last_update_turn", last_update );
2818 json.member( "pivot", pivot_anchor[0] );
2819 json.member( "is_following", is_following );
2820 json.member( "is_patrolling", is_patrolling );
2821 json.member( "autodrive_local_target", autodrive_local_target );
2822 json.member( "summon_time_limit", summon_time_limit );
2823 json.member( "magic", magic );
2824 json.end_object();
2825}
2826
2827////////////////// mission.h
2828////
2829void mission::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2830{
2831 JsonObject jo = jsin.get_object();
2832 jo.allow_omitted_members();
2833
2834 if( jo.has_int( "type_id" ) ) {
2835 type = &mission_type::from_legacy( jo.get_int( "type_id" ) ).obj();
2836 } else if( jo.has_string( "type_id" ) ) {
2837 type = &mission_type_id( jo.get_string( "type_id" ) ).obj();
2838 } else {
2839 debugmsg( "Saved mission has no type" );
2840 type = &mission_type::get_all().front();
2841 }
2842
2843 bool failed;
2844 bool was_started;
2845 std::string status_string;
2846 if( jo.read( "status", status_string ) ) {
2847 status = status_from_string( status_string );
2848 } else if( jo.read( "failed", failed ) && failed ) {
2849 status = mission_status::failure;
2850 } else if( jo.read( "was_started", was_started ) && !was_started ) {
2851 status = mission_status::yet_to_start;
2852 } else {
2853 // Note: old code had no idea of successful missions!
2854 // We can't check properly here, since most of the game isn't loaded
2855 status = mission_status::in_progress;
2856 }
2857
2858 jo.read( "value", value );
2859 jo.read( "kill_count_to_reach", kill_count_to_reach );
2860 jo.read( "reward", reward );
2861 jo.read( "uid", uid );
2862 JsonArray ja = jo.get_array( "target" );
2863 if( ja.size() == 3 ) {
2864 target.x() = ja.get_int( 0 );
2865 target.y() = ja.get_int( 1 );
2866 target.z() = ja.get_int( 2 );
2867 } else if( ja.size() == 2 ) {
2868 target.x() = ja.get_int( 0 );
2869 target.y() = ja.get_int( 1 );
2870 }
2871
2872 if( jo.has_int( "follow_up" ) ) {
2873 follow_up = mission_type::from_legacy( jo.get_int( "follow_up" ) );
2874 } else if( jo.has_string( "follow_up" ) ) {
2875 follow_up = mission_type_id( jo.get_string( "follow_up" ) );
2876 }
2877
2878 jo.read( "item_id", item_id );
2879
2880 const std::string omid = jo.get_string( "target_id", "" );
2881 if( !omid.empty() ) {
2882 target_id = string_id<oter_type_t>( omid );
2883 }
2884
2885 if( jo.has_int( "recruit_class" ) ) {
2886 recruit_class = npc_class::from_legacy_int( jo.get_int( "recruit_class" ) );
2887 } else {
2888 recruit_class = npc_class_id( jo.get_string( "recruit_class", "NC_NONE" ) );
2889 }
2890
2891 jo.read( "target_npc_id", target_npc_id );
2892 jo.read( "monster_type", monster_type );
2893 jo.read( "monster_species", monster_species );
2894 jo.read( "monster_kill_goal", monster_kill_goal );
2895 jo.read( "deadline", deadline );
2896 jo.read( "step", step );
2897 jo.read( "item_count", item_count );
2898 jo.read( "npc_id", npc_id );
2899 jo.read( "good_fac_id", good_fac_id );
2900 jo.read( "bad_fac_id", bad_fac_id );
2901
2902 // Suppose someone had two living players in an 0.C stable world. When loading player 1 in 0.D
2903 // (or maybe even creating a new player), the former condition makes legacy_no_player_id true.
2904 // When loading player 2, there will be a player_id member in SAVE_MASTER (i.e. master.gsav),
2905 // but the bool member legacy_no_player_id will have been saved as true
2906 // (unless the mission belongs to a player that's been loaded into 0.D)
2907 // See player::deserialize and mission::set_player_id_legacy_0c
2908 legacy_no_player_id = !jo.read( "player_id", player_id ) ||
2909 jo.get_bool( "legacy_no_player_id", false );
2910}
2911
2912void mission::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2913{
2914 json.start_object();
2915
2916 json.member( "type_id", type->id );
2917 json.member( "status", status_to_string( status ) );
2918 json.member( "value", value );
2919 json.member( "kill_count_to_reach", kill_count_to_reach );
2920 json.member( "reward", reward );
2921 json.member( "uid", uid );
2922
2923 json.member( "target" );
2924 json.start_array();
2925 json.write( target.x() );
2926 json.write( target.y() );
2927 json.write( target.z() );
2928 json.end_array();
2929
2930 json.member( "item_id", item_id );
2931 json.member( "item_count", item_count );
2932 json.member( "target_id", target_id.str() );
2933 json.member( "recruit_class", recruit_class );
2934 json.member( "target_npc_id", target_npc_id );
2935 json.member( "monster_type", monster_type );
2936 json.member( "monster_species", monster_species );
2937 json.member( "monster_kill_goal", monster_kill_goal );
2938 json.member( "deadline", deadline );
2939 json.member( "npc_id", npc_id );
2940 json.member( "good_fac_id", good_fac_id );
2941 json.member( "bad_fac_id", bad_fac_id );
2942 json.member( "step", step );
2943 json.member( "follow_up", follow_up );
2944 json.member( "player_id", player_id );
2945 json.member( "legacy_no_player_id", legacy_no_player_id );
2946
2947 json.end_object();
2948}

2950////////////////// faction.h

2952void faction::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
2953{
2954 JsonObject jo = jsin.get_object();
2955 jo.allow_omitted_members();
2956
2957 jo.read( "id", id );
2958 jo.read( "name", name );
2959 jo.read( "likes_u", likes_u );
2960 jo.read( "respects_u", respects_u );
2961 jo.read( "known_by_u", known_by_u );
2962 jo.read( "size", size );
2963 jo.read( "power", power );
2964 if( !jo.read( "food_supply", food_supply ) ) {
2965 food_supply = 100;
2966 }
2967 if( !jo.read( "wealth", wealth ) ) {
2968 wealth = 100;
2969 }
2970 if( jo.has_array( "opinion_of" ) ) {
2971 opinion_of = jo.get_int_array( "opinion_of" );
2972 }
2973 load_relations( jo );
2974}
2975
2976void faction::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
2977{
2978 json.start_object();
2979
2980 json.member( "id", id );
2981 json.member( "name", name );
2982 json.member( "likes_u", likes_u );
2983 json.member( "respects_u", respects_u );
2984 json.member( "known_by_u", known_by_u );
2985 json.member( "size", size );
2986 json.member( "power", power );
2987 json.member( "food_supply", food_supply );
2988 json.member( "wealth", wealth );
2989 json.member( "opinion_of", opinion_of );
2990 json.member( "relations" );
2991 json.start_object();
2992 for( const auto &rel_data : relations ) {
2993 json.member( rel_data.first );
2994 json.start_object();
2995 for( const auto &rel_flag : npc_factions::relation_strs ) {
2996 json.member( rel_flag.first, rel_data.second.test( rel_flag.second ) );
2997 }
2998 json.end_object();
2999 }
3000 json.end_object();
3001
3002 json.end_object();
3003}
3004
3005void Creature::store( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3006{
3007 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
3008 jsout.member( "pain", pain );
3009
3010 // killer is not stored, it's temporary anyway, any creature that has a non-null
3011 // killer is dead (as per definition) and should not be stored.
3012
3013 // Because JSON requires string keys we need to convert our int keys
3014 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::unordered_map<std::string, effect>> tmp_map;
3015 for( auto maps : *effects ) {
3016 for( const auto &i : maps.second ) {
3017 if( i.second.is_removed() ) {
3018 continue;
3019 }
3020 std::ostringstream convert;
3021 convert << i.first->token;
3022 tmp_map[maps.first.str()][convert.str()] = i.second;
3023 }
3024 }
3025 jsout.member( "effects", tmp_map );
3026
3027 jsout.member( "values", values );
3028
3029 jsout.member( "blocks_left", num_blocks );
3030 jsout.member( "dodges_left", num_dodges );
3031 jsout.member( "num_blocks_bonus", num_blocks_bonus );
3032 jsout.member( "num_dodges_bonus", num_dodges_bonus );
3033
3034 jsout.member( "armor_bash_bonus", armor_bash_bonus );
3035 jsout.member( "armor_cut_bonus", armor_cut_bonus );
3036 jsout.member( "armor_bullet_bonus", armor_bullet_bonus );
3037
3038 jsout.member( "speed", speed_base );
3039
3040 jsout.member( "speed_bonus", speed_bonus );
3041 jsout.member( "dodge_bonus", dodge_bonus );
3042 jsout.member( "block_bonus", block_bonus );
3043 jsout.member( "hit_bonus", hit_bonus );
3044
3045 jsout.member( "body", body );
3046
3047 // fake is not stored, it's temporary anyway, only used to fire with a gun.
3048}
3049
3050void Creature::load( const JsonObject &jsin )
3051{
3052 jsin.allow_omitted_members();
3053 jsin.read( "moves", moves );
3054 jsin.read( "pain", pain );
3055
3056 killer = nullptr; // see Creature::load
3057
3058 if( jsin.has_object( "effects" ) ) {
3059 // Because JSON requires string keys we need to convert back to our bp keys
3060 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::unordered_map<std::string, effect>> tmp_map;
3061 jsin.read( "effects", tmp_map );
3062 int key_num = 0;
3063 for( auto maps : tmp_map ) {
3064 const efftype_id id( maps.first );
3065 if( !id.is_valid() ) {
3066 debugmsg( "Invalid effect: %s", id.c_str() );
3067 continue;
3068 }
3069 for( auto i : maps.second ) {
3070 if( !( std::istringstream( i.first ) >> key_num ) ) {
3071 key_num = 0;
3072 }
3073 const bodypart_str_id &bp = convert_bp( static_cast<body_part>( key_num ) );
3074 effect &e = i.second;
3075
3076 ( *effects )[id][bp] = e;
3077 on_effect_int_change( id, e.get_intensity(), bp );
3078 }
3079 }
3080 }
3081 jsin.read( "values", values );
3082
3083 jsin.read( "blocks_left", num_blocks );
3084 jsin.read( "dodges_left", num_dodges );
3085 jsin.read( "num_blocks_bonus", num_blocks_bonus );
3086 jsin.read( "num_dodges_bonus", num_dodges_bonus );
3087
3088 jsin.read( "armor_bash_bonus", armor_bash_bonus );
3089 jsin.read( "armor_cut_bonus", armor_cut_bonus );
3090 jsin.read( "armor_bullet_bonus", armor_bullet_bonus );
3091
3092 jsin.read( "speed", speed_base );
3093
3094 jsin.read( "speed_bonus", speed_bonus );
3095 jsin.read( "dodge_bonus", dodge_bonus );
3096 jsin.read( "block_bonus", block_bonus );
3097 jsin.read( "hit_bonus", hit_bonus );
3098
3099 jsin.read( "underwater", underwater );
3100
3101 jsin.read( "body", body );
3102
3103 fake = false; // see Creature::load
3104
3105 on_stat_change( "pain", pain );
3106}

3185struct mm_elem {
3186 memorized_terrain_tile tile;
3187 int symbol;
3188
3189 bool operator==( const mm_elem &rhs ) const {
3190 return symbol == rhs.symbol && tile == rhs.tile;
3191 }
3192};
3193
3194void mm_submap::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3195{
3196 jsout.start_array();
3197
3198 // Uses RLE for compression.
3199
3200 mm_elem last;
3201 int num_same = 1;
3202
3203 const auto write_seq = [&]() {
3204 jsout.start_array();
3205 jsout.write( last.tile.tile );
3206 jsout.write( last.tile.subtile );
3207 jsout.write( last.tile.rotation );
3208 jsout.write( last.symbol );
3209 if( num_same != 1 ) {
3210 jsout.write( num_same );
3211 }
3212 jsout.end_array();
3213 };
3214
3215 for( size_t y = 0; y < SEEY; y++ ) {
3216 for( size_t x = 0; x < SEEX; x++ ) {
3217 point p( x, y );
3218 const mm_elem elem = { tile( p ), symbol( p ) };
3219 if( x == 0 && y == 0 ) {
3220 last = elem;
3221 continue;
3222 }
3223 if( last == elem ) {
3224 num_same += 1;
3225 continue;
3226 }
3227 write_seq();
3228 num_same = 1;
3229 last = elem;
3230 }
3231 }
3232 write_seq();
3233
3234 jsout.end_array();
3235}
3236
3237void mm_submap::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
3238{
3239 jsin.start_array();
3240
3241 // Uses RLE for compression.
3242
3243 mm_elem elem;
3244 size_t remaining = 0;
3245
3246 for( size_t y = 0; y < SEEY; y++ ) {
3247 for( size_t x = 0; x < SEEX; x++ ) {
3248 if( remaining > 0 ) {
3249 remaining -= 1;
3250 } else {
3251 jsin.start_array();
3252 elem.tile.tile = jsin.get_string();
3253 elem.tile.subtile = jsin.get_int();
3254 elem.tile.rotation = jsin.get_int();
3255 elem.symbol = jsin.get_int();
3256 if( jsin.test_int() ) {
3257 remaining = jsin.get_int() - 1;
3258 }
3259 jsin.end_array();
3260 }
3261 point p( x, y );
3262 // Try to avoid assigning to save up on memory
3263 if( elem.tile != mm_submap::default_tile ) {
3264 set_tile( p, elem.tile );
3265 }
3266 if( elem.symbol != mm_submap::default_symbol ) {
3267 set_symbol( p, elem.symbol );
3268 }
3269 }
3270 }
3271 jsin.end_array();
3272}
3273
3274void mm_region::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3275{
3276 jsout.start_array();
3277 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3278 for( size_t y = 0; y < MM_REG_SIZE; y++ ) {
3279 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3280 for( size_t x = 0; x < MM_REG_SIZE; x++ ) {
3281 const shared_ptr_fast<mm_submap> &sm = submaps[x][y];
3282 if( sm->is_empty() ) {
3283 jsout.write_null();
3284 } else {
3285 sm->serialize( jsout );
3286 }
3287 }
3288 }
3289 jsout.end_array();
3290}
3291
3292void mm_region::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
3293{
3294 jsin.start_array();
3295 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3296 for( size_t y = 0; y < MM_REG_SIZE; y++ ) {
3297 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert): leaving as is for readability
3298 for( size_t x = 0; x < MM_REG_SIZE; x++ ) {
3299 shared_ptr_fast<mm_submap> &sm = submaps[x][y];
3300 sm = make_shared_fast<mm_submap>();
3301 if( jsin.test_null() ) {
3302 jsin.skip_null();
3303 } else {
3304 sm->deserialize( jsin );
3305 }
3306 }
3307 }
3308 jsin.end_array();
3309}
3310
3311void map_memory::load_legacy( JsonIn &jsin )
3312{
3313 struct mig_elem {
3314 int symbol;
3315 memorized_terrain_tile tile;
3316 };
3317 std::map<tripoint, mig_elem> elems;
3318
3319 jsin.start_array();
3320 jsin.start_array();
3321 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3322 jsin.start_array();
3323 tripoint p;
3324 p.x = jsin.get_int();
3325 p.y = jsin.get_int();
3326 p.z = jsin.get_int();
3327 mig_elem &elem = elems[p];
3328 elem.tile.tile = jsin.get_string();
3329 elem.tile.subtile = jsin.get_int();
3330 elem.tile.rotation = jsin.get_int();
3331 jsin.end_array();
3332 }
3333 jsin.start_array();
3334 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3335 jsin.start_array();
3336 tripoint p;
3337 p.x = jsin.get_int();
3338 p.y = jsin.get_int();
3339 p.z = jsin.get_int();
3340 elems[p].symbol = jsin.get_int();
3341 jsin.end_array();
3342 }
3343 jsin.end_array();
3344
3345 for( const std::pair<const tripoint, mig_elem> &elem : elems ) {
3346 coord_pair cp( elem.first );
3347 shared_ptr_fast<mm_submap> sm = find_submap( cp.sm );
3348 if( !sm ) {
3349 sm = allocate_submap( cp.sm );
3350 }
3351 if( elem.second.tile != mm_submap::default_tile ) {
3352 sm->set_tile( cp.loc, elem.second.tile );
3353 }
3354 if( elem.second.symbol != mm_submap::default_symbol ) {
3355 sm->set_symbol( cp.loc, elem.second.symbol );
3356 }
3357 }
3358}

3524// basecamp
3525void basecamp::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
3526{
3527 if( omt_pos != tripoint_abs_omt() ) {
3528 json.start_object();
3529 json.member( "name", name );
3530 json.member( "pos", omt_pos );
3531 json.member( "bb_pos", bb_pos );
3532 json.member( "expansions" );
3533 json.start_array();
3534 for( const auto &expansion : expansions ) {
3535 json.start_object();
3536 json.member( "dir", expansion.first );
3537 json.member( "type", expansion.second.type );
3538 json.member( "provides" );
3539 json.start_array();
3540 for( const auto &provide : expansion.second.provides ) {
3541 json.start_object();
3542 json.member( "id", provide.first );
3543 json.member( "amount", provide.second );
3544 json.end_object();
3545 }
3546 json.end_array();
3547 json.member( "in_progress" );
3548 json.start_array();
3549 for( const auto &working : expansion.second.in_progress ) {
3550 json.start_object();
3551 json.member( "id", working.first );
3552 json.member( "amount", working.second );
3553 json.end_object();
3554 }
3555 json.end_array();
3556 json.member( "pos", expansion.second.pos );
3557 json.end_object();
3558 }
3559 json.end_array();
3560 json.member( "fortifications" );
3561 json.start_array();
3562 for( const auto &fortification : fortifications ) {
3563 json.start_object();
3564 json.member( "pos", fortification );
3565 json.end_object();
3566 }
3567 json.end_array();
3568 json.end_object();
3569 } else {
3570 return;
3571 }
3572}
3573
3574void basecamp::deserialize( JsonIn &jsin )
3575{
3576 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3577 data.allow_omitted_members();
3578 data.read( "name", name );
3579 data.read( "pos", omt_pos );
3580 data.read( "bb_pos", bb_pos );
3581 for( JsonObject edata : data.get_array( "expansions" ) ) {
3582 edata.allow_omitted_members();
3583 expansion_data e;
3584 point dir;
3585 if( edata.has_string( "dir" ) ) {
3586 // old save compatibility
3587 const std::string dir_id = edata.get_string( "dir" );
3588 dir = base_camps::direction_from_id( dir_id );
3589 } else {
3590 edata.read( "dir", dir );
3591 }
3592 edata.read( "type", e.type );
3593 if( edata.has_int( "cur_level" ) ) {
3594 edata.read( "cur_level", e.cur_level );
3595 }
3596 if( edata.has_array( "provides" ) ) {
3597 e.cur_level = -1;
3598 for( JsonObject provide_data : edata.get_array( "provides" ) ) {
3599 provide_data.allow_omitted_members();
3600 std::string id = provide_data.get_string( "id" );
3601 int amount = provide_data.get_int( "amount" );
3602 e.provides[ id ] = amount;
3603 }
3604 }
3605 // incase of save corruption, sanity check provides from expansions
3606 const std::string &initial_provide = base_camps::faction_encode_abs( e, 0 );
3607 if( e.provides.find( initial_provide ) == e.provides.end() ) {
3608 e.provides[ initial_provide ] = 1;
3609 }
3610 for( JsonObject in_progress_data : edata.get_array( "in_progress" ) ) {
3611 in_progress_data.allow_omitted_members();
3612 std::string id = in_progress_data.get_string( "id" );
3613 int amount = in_progress_data.get_int( "amount" );
3614 e.in_progress[ id ] = amount;
3615 }
3616 edata.read( "pos", e.pos );
3617 expansions[ dir ] = e;
3618 if( dir != base_camps::base_dir ) {
3619 directions.push_back( dir );
3620 }
3621 }
3622 for( JsonObject edata : data.get_array( "fortifications" ) ) {
3623 edata.allow_omitted_members();
3624 tripoint_abs_omt restore_pos;
3625 edata.read( "pos", restore_pos );
3626 fortifications.push_back( restore_pos );
3627 }
3628}

3714
3715void submap::store( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3716{
3717 jsout.member( "turn_last_touched", last_touched );
3718 jsout.member( "temperature", temperature );
3719
3720 // Terrain is saved using a simple RLE scheme. Legacy saves don't have
3721 // this feature but the algorithm is backward compatible.
3722 jsout.member( "terrain" );
3723 jsout.start_array();
3724 std::string last_id;
3725 int num_same = 1;
3726 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3727 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert)
3728 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3729 const std::string this_id = ter[i][j].obj().id.str();
3730 if( !last_id.empty() ) {
3731 if( this_id == last_id ) {
3732 num_same++;
3733 } else {
3734 if( num_same == 1 ) {
3735 // if there's only one element don't write as an array
3736 jsout.write( last_id );
3737 } else {
3738 jsout.start_array();
3739 jsout.write( last_id );
3740 jsout.write( num_same );
3741 jsout.end_array();
3742 num_same = 1;
3743 }
3744 last_id = this_id;
3745 }
3746 } else {
3747 last_id = this_id;
3748 }
3749 }
3750 }
3751 // Because of the RLE scheme we have to do one last pass
3752 if( num_same == 1 ) {
3753 jsout.write( last_id );
3754 } else {
3755 jsout.start_array();
3756 jsout.write( last_id );
3757 jsout.write( num_same );
3758 jsout.end_array();
3759 }
3760 jsout.end_array();
3761
3762 // Write out the radiation array in a simple RLE scheme.
3763 // written in intensity, count pairs
3764 jsout.member( "radiation" );
3765 jsout.start_array();
3766 int lastrad = -1;
3767 int count = 0;
3768 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3769 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3770 const point p( i, j );
3771 // Save radiation, re-examine this because it doesn't look like it works right
3772 int r = get_radiation( p );
3773 if( r == lastrad ) {
3774 count++;
3775 } else {
3776 if( count ) {
3777 jsout.write( count );
3778 }
3779 jsout.write( r );
3780 lastrad = r;
3781 count = 1;
3782 }
3783 }
3784 }
3785 jsout.write( count );
3786 jsout.end_array();
3787
3788 jsout.member( "furniture" );
3789 jsout.start_array();
3790 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3791 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3792 const point p( i, j );
3793 // Save furniture
3794 if( get_furn( p ) ) {
3795 jsout.start_array();
3796 jsout.write( p.x );
3797 jsout.write( p.y );
3798 jsout.write( get_furn( p ).obj().id );
3799 jsout.end_array();
3800 }
3801 }
3802 }
3803 jsout.end_array();
3804
3805 jsout.member( "items" );
3806 jsout.start_array();
3807 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3808 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3809 if( itm[i][j].empty() ) {
3810 continue;
3811 }
3812 jsout.write( i );
3813 jsout.write( j );
3814 jsout.write( itm[i][j] );
3815 }
3816 }
3817 jsout.end_array();
3818
3819 jsout.member( "traps" );
3820 jsout.start_array();
3821 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3822 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3823 const point p( i, j );
3824 // Save traps
3825 if( get_trap( p ) ) {
3826 jsout.start_array();
3827 jsout.write( p.x );
3828 jsout.write( p.y );
3829 // TODO: jsout should support writing an id like jsout.write( trap_id )
3830 jsout.write( get_trap( p ).id().str() );
3831 jsout.end_array();
3832 }
3833 }
3834 }
3835 jsout.end_array();
3836
3837 jsout.member( "fields" );
3838 jsout.start_array();
3839 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3840 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3841 // Save fields
3842 if( fld[i][j].field_count() > 0 ) {
3843 jsout.write( i );
3844 jsout.write( j );
3845 jsout.start_array();
3846 for( auto &elem : fld[i][j] ) {
3847 const field_entry &cur = elem.second;
3848 jsout.write( cur.get_field_type().id() );
3849 jsout.write( cur.get_field_intensity() );
3850 jsout.write( cur.get_field_age() );
3851 }
3852 jsout.end_array();
3853 }
3854 }
3855 }
3856 jsout.end_array();
3857
3858 // Write out as array of arrays of single entries
3859 jsout.member( "cosmetics" );
3860 jsout.start_array();
3861 for( const auto &cosm : cosmetics ) {
3862 jsout.start_array();
3863 jsout.write( cosm.pos.x );
3864 jsout.write( cosm.pos.y );
3865 jsout.write( cosm.type );
3866 jsout.write( cosm.str );
3867 jsout.end_array();
3868 }
3869 jsout.end_array();
3870
3871 // Output the spawn points
3872 jsout.member( "spawns" );
3873 jsout.start_array();
3874 for( auto &elem : spawns ) {
3875 jsout.start_array();
3876 // TODO: json should know how to write string_ids
3877 jsout.write( elem.type.str() );
3878 jsout.write( elem.count );
3879 jsout.write( elem.pos.x );
3880 jsout.write( elem.pos.y );
3881 jsout.write( elem.faction_id );
3882 jsout.write( elem.mission_id );
3883 jsout.write( elem.friendly );
3884 jsout.write( elem.name );
3885 jsout.end_array();
3886 }
3887 jsout.end_array();
3888
3889 jsout.member( "vehicles" );
3890 jsout.start_array();
3891 for( auto &elem : vehicles ) {
3892 // json lib doesn't know how to turn a vehicle * into a vehicle,
3893 // so we have to iterate manually.
3894 jsout.write( *elem );
3895 }
3896 jsout.end_array();
3897
3898 jsout.member( "partial_constructions" );
3899 jsout.start_array();
3900 for( auto &elem : partial_constructions ) {
3901 jsout.write( elem.first.x );
3902 jsout.write( elem.first.y );
3903 jsout.write( elem.first.z );
3904 jsout.write( elem.second.counter );
3905 jsout.write( elem.second.id.id() );
3906 jsout.start_array();
3907 for( auto &it : elem.second.components ) {
3908 jsout.write( it );
3909 }
3910 jsout.end_array();
3911 }
3912 jsout.end_array();
3913
3914 if( legacy_computer ) {
3915 // it's possible that no access to computers has been made and legacy_computer
3916 // is not cleared
3917 jsout.member( "computers", *legacy_computer );
3918 } else if( !computers.empty() ) {
3919 jsout.member( "computers" );
3920 jsout.start_array();
3921 for( auto &elem : computers ) {
3922 jsout.write( elem.first );
3923 jsout.write( elem.second );
3924 }
3925 jsout.end_array();
3926 }
3927
3928 // Output base camp if any
3929 if( camp ) {
3930 jsout.member( "camp", *camp );
3931 }
3932
3933 jsout.member( "active_furniture" );
3934 jsout.start_array();
3935 for( auto &pr : active_furniture ) {
3936 jsout.write( pr.first );
3937 pr.second.serialize( jsout );
3938 }
3939 jsout.end_array();
3940}
3941
3942void submap::load( JsonIn &jsin, const std::string &member_name, int version )
3943{
3944 if( member_name == "turn_last_touched" ) {
3945 last_touched = calendar::turn_zero + time_duration::from_turns( jsin.get_int() );
3946 } else if( member_name == "temperature" ) {
3947 temperature = jsin.get_int();
3948 } else if( member_name == "terrain" ) {
3949 // TODO: try block around this to error out if we come up short?
3950 jsin.start_array();
3951 // terrain is encoded using simple RLE
3952 int remaining = 0;
3953 int_id<ter_t> iid;
3954 for( int j = 0; j < SEEY; j++ ) {
3955 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-loop-convert)
3956 for( int i = 0; i < SEEX; i++ ) {
3957 if( !remaining ) {
3958 if( jsin.test_string() ) {
3959 iid = ter_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
3960 } else if( jsin.test_array() ) {
3961 jsin.start_array();
3962 iid = ter_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
3963 remaining = jsin.get_int() - 1;
3964 jsin.end_array();
3965 } else {
3966 debugmsg( "Mapbuffer terrain data is corrupt, expected string or array." );
3967 }
3968 } else {
3969 --remaining;
3970 }
3971 ter[i][j] = iid;
3972 }
3973 }
3974 if( remaining ) {
3975 debugmsg( "Mapbuffer terrain data is corrupt, tile data remaining." );
3976 }
3977 jsin.end_array();
3978 } else if( member_name == "radiation" ) {
3979 int rad_cell = 0;
3980 jsin.start_array();
3981 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3982 int rad_strength = jsin.get_int();
3983 int rad_num = jsin.get_int();
3984 for( int i = 0; i < rad_num; ++i ) {
3985 if( rad_cell < SEEX * SEEY ) {
3986 set_radiation( { 0 % SEEX, rad_cell / SEEX }, rad_strength );
3987 rad_cell++;
3988 }
3989 }
3990 }
3991 } else if( member_name == "furniture" ) {
3992 jsin.start_array();
3993 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
3994 jsin.start_array();
3995 int i = jsin.get_int();
3996 int j = jsin.get_int();
3997 frn[i][j] = furn_id( jsin.get_string() );
3998 jsin.end_array();
3999 }
4000 } else if( member_name == "items" ) {
4001 jsin.start_array();
4002 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4003 int i = jsin.get_int();
4004 int j = jsin.get_int();
4005 const point p( i, j );
4006 jsin.start_array();
4007 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4008 item tmp;
4009 jsin.read( tmp );
4010
4011 if( tmp.is_emissive() ) {
4012 update_lum_add( p, tmp );
4013 }
4014
4015 if( savegame_loading_version >= 27 && version < 27 ) {
4016 tmp.legacy_fast_forward_time();
4017 }
4018
4019 const cata::colony<item>::iterator it = itm[p.x][p.y].insert( tmp );
4020 if( tmp.needs_processing() ) {
4021 active_items.add( *it, p );
4022 }
4023 }
4024 }
4025 for( auto &it1 : itm ) {
4026 for( auto &it2 : it1 ) {
4027 to_cbc_migration::migrate( it2 );
4028 }
4029 }
4030 } else if( member_name == "traps" ) {
4031 jsin.start_array();
4032 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4033 jsin.start_array();
4034 int i = jsin.get_int();
4035 int j = jsin.get_int();
4036 const point p( i, j );
4037 // TODO: jsin should support returning an id like jsin.get_id<trap>()
4038 trp[p.x][p.y] = trap_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
4039 jsin.end_array();
4040 }
4041 } else if( member_name == "fields" ) {
4042 jsin.start_array();
4043 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4044 // Coordinates loop
4045 int i = jsin.get_int();
4046 int j = jsin.get_int();
4047 jsin.start_array();
4048 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4049 // TODO: Check enum->string migration below
4050 int type_int = 0;
4051 std::string type_str;
4052 if( jsin.test_int() ) {
4053 type_int = jsin.get_int();
4054 } else {
4055 type_str = jsin.get_string();
4056 }
4057 int intensity = jsin.get_int();
4058 int age = jsin.get_int();
4059 field_type_id ft;
4060 if( !type_str.empty() ) {
4061 ft = field_type_id( type_str );
4062 } else {
4063 ft = field_types::get_field_type_by_legacy_enum( type_int ).id;
4064 }
4065 if( fld[i][j].find_field( ft ) == nullptr ) {
4066 field_count++;
4067 }
4068 fld[i][j].add_field( ft, intensity, time_duration::from_turns( age ) );
4069 }
4070 }
4071 } else if( member_name == "graffiti" ) {
4072 jsin.start_array();
4073 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4074 jsin.start_array();
4075 int i = jsin.get_int();
4076 int j = jsin.get_int();
4077 const point p( i, j );
4078 set_graffiti( p, jsin.get_string() );
4079 jsin.end_array();
4080 }
4081 } else if( member_name == "cosmetics" ) {
4082 jsin.start_array();
4083 std::map<std::string, std::string> tcosmetics;
4084
4085 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4086 jsin.start_array();
4087 int i = jsin.get_int();
4088 int j = jsin.get_int();
4089 const point p( i, j );
4090 std::string type, str;
4091 // Try to read as current format
4092 if( jsin.test_string() ) {
4093 type = jsin.get_string();
4094 str = jsin.get_string();
4095 insert_cosmetic( p, type, str );
4096 } else {
4097 // Otherwise read as most recent old format
4098 jsin.read( tcosmetics );
4099 for( auto &cosm : tcosmetics ) {
4100 insert_cosmetic( p, cosm.first, cosm.second );
4101 }
4102 tcosmetics.clear();
4103 }
4104
4105 jsin.end_array();
4106 }
4107 } else if( member_name == "spawns" ) {
4108 jsin.start_array();
4109 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4110 jsin.start_array();
4111 // TODO: json should know how to read an string_id
4112 const mtype_id type = mtype_id( jsin.get_string() );
4113 int count = jsin.get_int();
4114 int i = jsin.get_int();
4115 int j = jsin.get_int();
4116 const point p( i, j );
4117 int faction_id = jsin.get_int();
4118 int mission_id = jsin.get_int();
4119 bool friendly = jsin.get_bool();
4120 std::string name = jsin.get_string();
4121 jsin.end_array();
4122 spawn_point tmp( type, count, p, faction_id, mission_id, friendly, name );
4123 spawns.push_back( tmp );
4124 }
4125 } else if( member_name == "vehicles" ) {
4126 jsin.start_array();
4127 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4128 std::unique_ptr<vehicle> tmp = std::make_unique<vehicle>();
4129 jsin.read( *tmp );
4130 vehicles.push_back( std::move( tmp ) );
4131 }
4132 } else if( member_name == "partial_constructions" ) {
4133 jsin.start_array();
4134 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4135 partial_con pc;
4136 int i = jsin.get_int();
4137 int j = jsin.get_int();
4138 int k = jsin.get_int();
4139 tripoint pt = tripoint( i, j, k );
4140 pc.counter = jsin.get_int();
4141 if( jsin.test_int() ) {
4142 // Oops, int id incorrectly saved by legacy code, just load it and hope for the best
4143 pc.id = construction_id( jsin.get_int() );
4144 } else {
4145 pc.id = construction_str_id( jsin.get_string() ).id();
4146 }
4147 jsin.start_array();
4148 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4149 item tmp;
4150 jsin.read( tmp );
4151 pc.components.push_back( tmp );
4152 }
4153 partial_constructions[pt] = pc;
4154 }
4155 } else if( member_name == "computers" ) {
4156 if( jsin.test_array() ) {
4157 jsin.start_array();
4158 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4159 point loc;
4160 jsin.read( loc );
4161 auto new_comp_it = computers.emplace( loc, computer( "BUGGED_COMPUTER", -100 ) ).first;
4162 jsin.read( new_comp_it->second );
4163 }
4164 } else {
4165 // only load legacy data here, but do not update to std::map, since
4166 // the terrain may not have been loaded yet.
4167 legacy_computer = std::make_unique<computer>( "BUGGED_COMPUTER", -100 );
4168 jsin.read( *legacy_computer );
4169 }
4170 } else if( member_name == "camp" ) {
4171 camp = std::make_unique<basecamp>();
4172 jsin.read( *camp );
4173 } else if( member_name == "active_furniture" ) {
4174 jsin.start_array();
4175 while( !jsin.end_array() ) {
4176 point_sm_ms p;
4177 jsin.read( p );
4178 active_furniture[p].deserialize( jsin );
4179 }
4180 } else {
4181 jsin.skip_value();
4182 }
4183}

4252
4253void uistatedata::serialize( JsonOut &json ) const
4254{
4255 const unsigned int input_history_save_max = 25;
4256 json.start_object();
4257
4258 transfer_save.serialize( json, "transfer_save_" );
4259
4260 /**** if you want to save whatever so it's whatever when the game is started next, declare here and.... ****/
4261 // non array stuffs
4262 json.member( "adv_inv_container_location", adv_inv_container_location );
4263 json.member( "adv_inv_container_index", adv_inv_container_index );
4264 json.member( "adv_inv_container_in_vehicle", adv_inv_container_in_vehicle );
4265 json.member( "adv_inv_container_type", adv_inv_container_type );
4266 json.member( "adv_inv_container_content_type", adv_inv_container_content_type );
4267 json.member( "debug_menu", debug_menu );
4268 json.member( "editmap_nsa_viewmode", editmap_nsa_viewmode );
4269 json.member( "overmap_blinking", overmap_blinking );
4270 json.member( "overmap_show_overlays", overmap_show_overlays );
4271 json.member( "overmap_show_map_notes", overmap_show_map_notes );
4272 json.member( "overmap_show_land_use_codes", overmap_show_land_use_codes );
4273 json.member( "overmap_show_city_labels", overmap_show_city_labels );
4274 json.member( "overmap_show_hordes", overmap_show_hordes );
4275 json.member( "overmap_show_forest_trails", overmap_show_forest_trails );
4276 json.member( "vmenu_show_items", vmenu_show_items );
4277 json.member( "list_item_sort", list_item_sort );
4278 json.member( "list_item_filter_active", list_item_filter_active );
4279 json.member( "list_item_downvote_active", list_item_downvote_active );
4280 json.member( "list_item_priority_active", list_item_priority_active );
4281 json.member( "hidden_recipes", hidden_recipes );
4282 json.member( "favorite_recipes", favorite_recipes );
4283 json.member( "recent_recipes", recent_recipes );
4284 json.member( "bionic_ui_sort_mode", bionic_sort_mode );
4285 json.member( "overmap_debug_weather", overmap_debug_weather );
4286 json.member( "overmap_visible_weather", overmap_visible_weather );
4287
4288 json.member( "input_history" );
4289 json.start_object();
4290 for( auto &e : input_history ) {
4291 json.member( e.first );
4292 const std::vector<std::string> &history = e.second;
4293 json.start_array();
4294 int save_start = 0;
4295 if( history.size() > input_history_save_max ) {
4296 save_start = history.size() - input_history_save_max;
4297 }
4298 for( std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator hit = history.begin() + save_start;
4299 hit != history.end(); ++hit ) {
4300 json.write( *hit );
4301 }
4302 json.end_array();
4303 }
4304 json.end_object(); // input_history
4305
4306 json.end_object();
4307}
4308
4309void uistatedata::deserialize( const JsonObject &jo )
4310{
4311 transfer_save.deserialize( jo, "transfer_save_" );
4312
4313 // the rest
4314 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_location", adv_inv_container_location );
4315 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_index", adv_inv_container_index );
4316 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_in_vehicle", adv_inv_container_in_vehicle );
4317 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_type", adv_inv_container_type );
4318 jo.read( "adv_inv_container_content_type", adv_inv_container_content_type );
4319 jo.read( "debug_menu", debug_menu );
4320 jo.read( "editmap_nsa_viewmode", editmap_nsa_viewmode );
4321 jo.read( "overmap_blinking", overmap_blinking );
4322 jo.read( "overmap_show_overlays", overmap_show_overlays );
4323 jo.read( "overmap_show_map_notes", overmap_show_map_notes );
4324 jo.read( "overmap_show_land_use_codes", overmap_show_land_use_codes );
4325 jo.read( "overmap_show_city_labels", overmap_show_city_labels );
4326 jo.read( "overmap_show_hordes", overmap_show_hordes );
4327 jo.read( "overmap_show_forest_trails", overmap_show_forest_trails );
4328 jo.read( "hidden_recipes", hidden_recipes );
4329 jo.read( "favorite_recipes", favorite_recipes );
4330 jo.read( "recent_recipes", recent_recipes );
4331 jo.read( "bionic_ui_sort_mode", bionic_sort_mode );
4332 jo.read( "overmap_debug_weather", overmap_debug_weather );
4333 jo.read( "overmap_visible_weather", overmap_visible_weather );
4334
4335 if( !jo.read( "vmenu_show_items", vmenu_show_items ) ) {
4336 // This is an old save: 1 means view items, 2 means view monsters,
4337 // -1 means uninitialized
4338 vmenu_show_items = jo.get_int( "list_item_mon", -1 ) != 2;
4339 }
4340
4341 jo.read( "list_item_sort", list_item_sort );
4342 jo.read( "list_item_filter_active", list_item_filter_active );
4343 jo.read( "list_item_downvote_active", list_item_downvote_active );
4344 jo.read( "list_item_priority_active", list_item_priority_active );
4345
4346 for( const JsonMember member : jo.get_object( "input_history" ) ) {
4347 std::vector<std::string> &v = gethistory( member.name() );

4351 }
4352 }
